title: Reencle: Kitchen-to-Garden Fertilizer Composter
description: Converts Food Scraps to Nutrient-Rich Fertilizer | Add Food Anytime | Zero Odor | 1.5 Lbs Capacity
allParagraphs: Converts Food Scraps to Nutrient-Rich Fertilizer | Add Food Anytime | Zero Odor | 1.5 Lbs Capacity
Cultivate ReencleMicrobe™ - your own microorganisms especially selected to devour food waste, no matter how salty or acidic.
The result? Ready-to-use, homemade organic super food for your plants.
*Reencle can process certified compostable packaging and certified home bioplastics.
With 100,000+ reviews & counting, customers love Reencle.
Add food any time. Reencle runs quietly and safely around the clock, so you don't need to wait until it's finished with earlier food scraps. Just scoop out the fertilizer when it's looking full.
*Actual time very depending on the nature of the food waste.
Reencle’s fertilizer has been tested and surpassed the quality standard.
Breakthrough 3-layer filter system ensures odor-free composting. Enjoy the convenience of fast organic composting without odor.
The ReencleMicrobe™ can survive in high acidity and high salinity environments and at extreme temperatures. It doesn’t need to be replaced and can be used for cycle after cycle.
Reencle operates quietly under the level of 28dB, making it the quietest composter on the market.
Get Reencle’s attention with your foot, or a wave of your hand — and the lid will open automatically.
Hangers for your scooping shovel are located on both sides and the back of Reencle for easy hook-in-place stowage.
Not all composts & fertilizers are created equal.

Reencle organic ReencleMicrobe™ are extremely halotolerant and acidophilic, allowing them to work uninterrupted when tasked with breaking down food waste with high levels of salt or acidity. ReencleMicrobe™ is derived from food, it is harmless to the human body and to the environment.
In other companies' additive mixes, this acidic or salty food can kill the microorganisms, preventing them from completing their job.

Back in the year 1980, Korea imported most of the hoses from Japan. This market structure was becoming a burden leaving the Korean consumers with no choice but to pay higher prices for the hoses. CEO Bang strived to change the biased market and wished Korean consumers to buy hose products at more affordable prices. After a rigorous endeavor, he successfully localized hose products and start supplying to many leading corporations in Korea, such as LG Electronics.
Since then, Hanmi Flexible constantly researched and developed not only hoses but also the products that are beneficial to people's daily lives such as humidifiers, washing machines, and Juicers.

When the London Convention and London Protocol(2013), an international treaty that bans all food waste dumping into marine environment, was implemented in Korea which quickly led to a major food waste issues. According to the waste statistics in many countries, food waste accounts for about 30-35% of the total wastes. In fact, all countries are spending immense money in processing these food wastes every year(800 billion to 1 trillion KRW in Korea).

The devastation of the global environment caused by food wastes came to CEO Bang's attention with great shock. With aspiration to pass on a better environment to future generations, Hanmi Flexible began developing a product that will help our environment. After six long years of constant R&D efforts, we were finally able to launch our first generation of food recycler Reencle in the market. Fortunately, many Korean consumers also showed great interests in the environmental protection and Reencle recorded sales of 3,000 units in 2019, 6,000 units in 2020, and over 40,000 units in 2021.

title: GreyBand: Wearable Breathalyzer
description: The world's first wearable breathalyzer with Bluetooth capabilities for an associated smartphone app
allParagraphs: The world's first wearable breathalyzer with Bluetooth capabilities for an associated smartphone app
GreyBand is the world's first wearable breathalyzer equipped with Bluetooth capabilities for a proprietary smartphone application and social network.
On the app, set your desired limit of intoxication. When you blow into the device, it will either shine a green light: continue drinking responsibly; a yellow light: slow down; or a red light: stop.
When you or your loved ones get overly intoxicated, designated friends are notified with options to help.

Alcohol with friends is one of the greatest joys in life. Unfortunately, you or someone you know has made a decision you regret under the influence. Whether it's embarrassing yourself in public, sending a too-risky text, or worse.

We believe in an evidence-based approach to proactive health solutions. According to the scientific literature, there are three ways to improve upon existing breathalyzer technology. These are the basis of GreyBand's design.

We created the Sundown App to be your ultimate social companion. Pair your GreyBand, and leverage blood alcohol readings, safety notifications, and personalized data to have a great time and get home safely. Available for iOS and Android.
Enjoy peace of mind knowing you and your loved ones are safe with GreyBand!
USB C charging
24 hour battery life
Visual indicators for battery life, Bluetooth connection, and relative intoxication
Haptic feedback
Made in the USA

Hi, I’m Cade Spector, founder & CEO of GreySun Technologies. I founded this company and invented GreyBand in honor of my older brother Grey, who took his life amid battles with substance-misuse disorders in 2020. It is my hope and belief that GreyBand can and will help people like him, and families like ours. Click for a tribute video about Grey and the GreyBand.

We have worked extremely hard to make this product ready for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing. FULFILLMENT: Sometimes, stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a package gets held up at customs, a shipment gets lost, or a global pandemic shuts down shipping ports around the world. Those things can cause delays. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

title: VR Ears: Hear Off-World, Listen Off-Ear
description: Off-ear speakers that deliver high performance audio to all leading VR headsets and standalone.
allParagraphs: Off-ear speakers that deliver high performance audio to all leading VR headsets and standalone.
Order VR Ears now at rebuffreality.com/products/vr-ears !

Modern video game engines and VR applications already utilize advanced 3D spatial and binaural audio algorithms that deliver sound in L/R stereo channels. VR Ears delivers this audio experience to players in the best way possible while in motion.
• Sound field that completely surrounds and engulfs you in the virtual world.
• Pinpoint positional audio direction lets you “just know” where your enemies are.
• Massive improvement in comfort means you can play for many hours longer.

Surround sound speaker setups cannot deliver positional audio in VR without the power of levitation. VR ears gives you the full feeling of off-ear surround sound, even as you move your head and body, no matter where the shot is coming from.
• Sounds that move every which way, with you and the video.
• Don’t just listen to the world, feel as though you live within it.
What is Sound stage?  The width, depth and height of the projected stereo image.
What is Audio Imaging?  The positional cues and accuracy of said position of audio sources.

Off-ear speaker design, pulls localization of the sound stage out of the head of the listener and transports you directly into the sound field. Experience a visceral feeling as if you were a listener placed in the center of the virtual world.

Before sound enters your ears, it bounces around all the flesh on the outer ear(pinna). This biological structure is in fact a large part of what helps you to perceive sound direction and contributes to the reason our ears are shaped in this strange way.
VR Ears is the first cross-platform wearable audio device that takes advantage of the outer ear to its full potential.

Most headphones on the market are only passive. To be able to reach the optimum SPL (Sound Pressure Level) at the ear, we made VR Ears active, adding in a lithium polymer battery (lasts up to 8 hours), high efficiency Digital Amplifier and Digital Signal Processor (DSP).
Digital Amplifier: Drives the premium near-field speakers, while minimizing power consumption
Digital Signal Processor (DSP): Monitors the input signal, while continuously optimizing the output to be distortion free for the amplifier
This provides the power to the custom designed near-field drivers to deliver a deep, detailed, and dynamic sound that completely immerses you into the game.
VR ears has developed an audio experience that is nearly on par with sound in the real world, while display optics may need time to catch up. VR Ears is ready for that future.
Easy to attach to all the above VR headsets with our modular mechanical attachment clips. Support for further headsets will be released over time with future updates.
VR Ears is fully compatible with Quest 2 and the Elite Straps.
Note: headsets without a firm head strap, such as the original VIVE without a deluxe audio strap and PiMax without a firm head strap require the VR Ears Universal HeadStrap to use.

The combination of incredible comfort, complete utilization of the outer ear for positional audio, and a fully immersive sound field and sound stage means you will hear the unimaginable new worlds in VR in incredible new ways.
Acoustic Performance: Near-field 40mm speaker drivers
Better sound accuracy means getting the drop on an enemy faster, or avoiding death in precarious situations. Let all who dare to sneak up on you beware the VR Ears.
VR Ears HeadStrap™ brings the groundbreaking sensory perception, high-precision positional audio, and incredible comfort of off-ear speakers to nearly all wearable audio situations.

The VR Ears USB-C port which charges VR Ears also functions as a plug and play audio device. When using USB, such as with PC/Console gaming with HeadStrap, you will be able to game on and charge simultaneously.

HeadStrap is an unfinalized stretch goal and the final product may not be identical to what is seen here. HeadStrap will be sold separately for $29.99 and 30% off for KickStarter backers, available for purchase post-campaign via Pledge Manager.
*We are targeting this holiday season to send out all the stretch goal accessories to our backers, Boom-mic, HeadStrap, VR Ears Carrying Case, and 5FT Multi-Function cable.

Rebuff Reality exists to deliver groundbreaking sensory perception within unimaginable new worlds. We are more than 3 years old and VR Ears is not our first hardware project. We have already designed, developed, and shipped a number of amazing products to our customers around the world that enhance their level of immersion within virtual worlds.

This is also not our team's first audio product. We have shipped speakers and headphones for most of the worlds top brands with our previous companies. We have a deep knowledge of acoustics engineering and manufacturing.

Leadership team with a diverse background in audio, gaming, hardware, and design working with a number of the world’s most renowned developers, publishers, and brands from their founding days to bring new products to market or scale up into global leaders.

I have to admit, I didn't originally design the Moball Roller to sell to you. I created it in a time of my life when I truly needed a better tool for of my own healing, recovery and performance. Will you help me get this game-changing tool out to you and the rest of the world?
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
- Bryan Osuna - Founder of Committed HP
What specifically makes the Moball Roller so Amazing?
✓  Innovative Dual-Ball Technology
✓  Adjusts to Your Needs
✓  Ridiculously Easy to Use
✓  Precise for Addressing Key Areas
✓  Versatile Shapes, Features & Uses
✓  Lightweight & Comes in a Travel Size

You Deserve to Feel & Function Better!
"I Love My Back Pain!" Said No One Ever.

Back Pain is a growing epidemic. Studies have named it the leading cause of inactivity and work disability worldwide. Statistically, you or someone you love will likely experience back pain this year. Poor myofascial health and posture can be directly linked to back pain. The Moball Roller is not only perfect for improving tissue health through self myofascial release, but also for facilitating mobility and postural correction drills.

The myofascial system is an intricate and interactive network of tissue that runs throughout the body to support the musculoskeletal system. Fascia plays an important role in many aspects of health, longevity and performance. Unhealthy fascia can lead to pain and dysfunction in addition to impaired strength, mobility, balance, coordination, circulation and even organ function. The Moball Roller is uniquely designed to help you optimize the health of this system.

title: A Tool Watch for Long Distance Shooters by OUTCAST
description: A field watch with crosswind multipliers and a quick MIL-to-MOA conversion scale.
allParagraphs: A field watch with crosswind multipliers and a quick MIL-to-MOA conversion scale.
1.) THE DIALS ARE FINISHED AND HAVE BEEN SHIPPED TO BACKERS!!!

2.) WE SOLD OUT OF EXISTING OUTCAST BEZEL INSERTS AND HAD TO ORDER MORE.  WATCHES THAT REQUIRE THIS MULTI-FUNCTION BEZEL INSERT, WILL HAVE TO WAIT UNTIL THE END OF JULY/AUGUST,  BEFORE THEY ARE SHIPPED.
3.) ALL OTHER WATCH ORDERS (INCLUDING WATCHES THAT USE A STANDARD ELAPSED TIMER) WILL BE BUILT & SHIPPED BY JULY 15.

You can choose from a 39mm Field Watch or a Submariner Case, in Stainless or PVD Black.  For those that don't want our multi-functional insert, can order the Black or Stainless  Submariner with a standard elapsed bezel, shown further below.
STAINLESS 39mm Shooting Watch
https://youtube.com/shorts/zD_Eq-IqmHE?feature=...
PVD BLACK 39mm Shooting Watch
https://youtube.com/shorts/wTqSUpeqepM?feature=...
STAINLESS Submariner w ELAPSED Bezel
https://youtube.com/shorts/EZX3VZuTwh4?feature=...
STAINLESS Submariner w OUTCAST Bezel
https://youtube.com/shorts/3gd7PeI9mk8?feature=...
PVD BLACK Submariner w OUTCAST Bezel
https://youtube.com/shorts/UFy753VsX1M?feature=...

My name is Rob Valli. I'm an ex-pro dog sled racer, lifelong hunter, outdoorsman, gear & firearm designer... and founder of OUTCAST Watch.  My first watch, the OUTCAST Field & Sea, was inspired by a 200-mile World Cup sled dog race in Eastern Siberia, where I won Bronze for the U.S.  I needed a way to time heats and track both countdown and elapsed time—and the watch I was wearing only had an elapsed timer, so I built a watch with both. That watch was 400% funded last year, with zero returns. This is the same platform, same partners—just a new dial with a new mission. (You can check out the original campaign by going here and scrolling down.)

My newest creation— the Marksman Dial—is built for a different kind of fieldwork, and aimed specifically at long distances hunters and competition shooters, by acting as a reference to adjust for crosswinds, and to convert between MILs and MOA, quickly.

Like the Field & Sea watch, the Marksman watch is close to my heart.  I started shooting at five years old, and have harvested more than 40 bucks over the years, since then. I’ve also owned a firearms company and designed and patented firearm components for several years, so this isn't venture into this space.

That said, I’ve already pre-paid for the custom parts, and they arrived and everything else is ready to go, since we are using the same case parts, movements, and supplier from the first campaign - your support will turn these dials and hands into fully assembled watches.
Half photo, half photoshop of a Marksman Watch, using the signature OUTCAST Adventure Bezel.

The custom dial and hands are already in production. We’re using the same supplier we used for our original OUTCAST Field & Sea watch—same NH35 automatic movement, same stainless steel casebacks, same bracelets.
Your support goes toward:
As a backer, you’ll get:

This is NOT a 36mm, like I showed you in the video... this is a 39mm case, wrapped in plastic film, ready to be assembled, next week.  Everyone voted on going bigger, so we switched from 36mm to 39mm.
Crosswind Correction
The numbers around the edge of the dial are crosswind correction factors—same as the cosine values you'd use in a ballistic calculator.
That gives you the effective crosswind speed to use when calculating your hold.
Example: 10 mph wind from 1 o’clock → factor at 1 = 0.5, so 10 × 0.5 = 5 mph is your effective crosswind ...That 5 mph is what you plug into your ballistic data—not the full 10.
Image of the first 5 Sample Watches.

MIL to MOA Conversion
If you treat the hour markers as MILs, then the inner track is your MOA equivalents.  This way, if your data and your scope aren’t in the same system, you can quickly convert between them without a chart or your phone. It’s a visual reference that saves time and prevents mistakes.
Note the OUTCAST LOGO on the crown, clasp, and Casebook, unlike the watches you saw in the video.

Most watches are designed for collectors or aesthetics. This one isn’t. This project is for shooters who want more from their gear.  It’s for people who send rounds long distances, in wind, under pressure, and need to be on target. The Marksman Dial gives you critical non-caliber specific ballistic info where you can actually use it—in the field, in the moment, without distraction.  Your support helps us finish production and keep this kind of gear going—purpose-built, field-tested.

We’ve already worked with this manufacturer for over two years and really like them. They’ve built every OUTCAST watch to date. Same movements. Same bracelets. Same QC process. The only new element is the 39mm case, which is made by the same company.  So we are confident we can execute and provide you with a watch worth more than you are paying for.

We’ve already prepaid for the dials and hands months ago, and they are now ready, and the remaining parts are sourced, and built 'on demand', so we can ship quickly, once funding is secured, without having to inventory the bulk of what we need to produce a watch.
Like I said, this isn't our first rodeo:)
For more information about us and our watches, go to https://outcastwatch.com

title: JAVÉ
description: A luxury brand offering premium fashion and beauty products  Www.houseofjave.co
allParagraphs: A luxury brand offering premium fashion and beauty products Www.houseofjave.co
Hi, I’m Lucy — Founder of JAVÉ.
www.houseofjave.co
www.instagram.com/houseofjave/

We’re launching our dream project on Indiegogo, and YOU can be part of the very beginning.
Support now and get listed as a Founding One Backer – your name will live with us forever
Limited spots… The future starts with you.

With a background in luxury fashion and a passion for beauty that empowers, I created JAVÉ to celebrate elegance, confidence, and individuality. This brand is more than makeup or clothing — it’s a statement of style and strength.

This campaign is deeply personal. It marks the launch of our first full collection — blending haute couture aesthetics with premium, cruelty-free cosmetics. I’ve poured everything into this vision, and now I’m inviting you to be part of it.
Your support doesn’t just fund a product — it helps build a brand with purpose.
Together, we can shape a luxury house that redefines beauty standards and inspires bold self-expression across the world.
Let’s make something unforgettable — together.
What We Need & Where the Funds Will Go
To bring the next chapter of JAVÉ to life, we are seeking $75,000 USD in funding. Here’s a transparent breakdown of how your support will be used:

40% – Production & Manufacturing:
High-quality, cruelty-free makeup products and luxurious packaging that reflect the elegance of JAVÉ.

25% – Branding & Visual Content:
Fashion shoots, videos, and promotional campaigns to launch the new collection with a strong visual identity.

20% – Website & E-commerce Development:
Enhancing the shopping experience on our site, ensuring seamless navigation, checkout, and global reach.

10% – Logistics & Packaging:
Custom packaging and reliable shipping to deliver your rewards in pristine condition.

5% – Legal & Business Setup:
Trademarks, formulations, and other key steps to protect and scale our brand properly.Our Unique Perks
We’re not just giving you product — we’re welcoming you into the world of JAVÉ. Here’s what backers will receive:
✨ Exclusive first access to the new makeup and fashion line.
? Limited-edition gift sets only available through this campaign.
? Personalized thank-you notes and digital shoutouts.
? Private invitations to our virtual launch party and future events.
If We Don’t Hit Our Full Goal

Even if we don’t reach 100% of our funding target, your contributions will still go toward production and fulfilling your perks first. The full vision may roll out in phases, but rest assured — your support will directly push JAVÉ forward, and we’ll keep you updated every step of the way.
Why This Campaign Matters — And What Your Support Makes Possible

At its heart, JAVÉ is about more than beauty — it’s about building a global brand that empowers people to feel confident, elegant, and unapologetically themselves. We believe luxury should be inclusive, conscious, and meaningful.

Your contribution supports a vision that’s rooted in quality, artistry, and purpose. Every product we create — from our couture-inspired designs to our high-performance, cruelty-free makeup — is crafted with meticulous attention to detail and an uncompromising standard of excellence.
This isn’t just a launch.
It’s a movement toward refined, responsible beauty that celebrates identity while setting a new standard in luxury.

While this is our first full-scale launch, we’ve already built strong foundations — from product testing and packaging prototypes to website development and creative direction. We’ve invested time, resources, and heart into every step. Now, we need your help to take JAVÉ to the world.
Your support isn’t just financial — it’s foundational.
It fuels our ability to scale ethically, create jobs, champion artistry, and build a legacy brand that inspires.
By backing JAVÉ, you’re not just supporting a project.
You’re becoming part of something timeless
Risks & Challenges
Every ambitious project comes with challenges — and at JAVÉ, we embrace them with preparation and resilience.

One of our main challenges is scaling production while maintaining the high standards of quality and craftsmanship that define our brand. Luxury takes time, precision, and care — and that means working closely with suppliers, manufacturers, and fulfillment partners who share our values.

We’ve already laid strong groundwork through prototyping, packaging development, supplier vetting, and small-batch production trials. This gives us the insight and experience needed to identify bottlenecks early and adapt quickly.

Other potential risks include shipping delays, regulatory approvals for international beauty markets, or fluctuations in raw material availability. We’re addressing these by working with experienced consultants, maintaining clear communication with all stakeholders, and building in buffers to timelines to manage expectations.

As the founder of JAVÉ, I’ve spent years immersed in the worlds of fashion, branding, and product development. I understand the demands of launching a luxury brand — and I’m committed to transparency, regular updates, and full accountability every step of the way.
Your trust means everything, and I will honor it with clarity, consistency, and a relentless commitment to delivering what I’ve promised.
Every Bit of Support Matters
We understand that not everyone can contribute financially — and that’s perfectly okay! But if JAVÉ’s vision resonates with you, there’s still a powerful way you can help:
? Spread the word.
Tell your friends, share it on your socials, and help us reach more people who believe in beauty with purpose.
? Use the Indiegogo share tools to post this campaign with just a click — your voice could be the reason someone else discovers and supports JAVÉ.
Your support — in any form — means the world to us.
Thank you for being part of this journey.

title: Navigator's Loupe by Oceanus Brass
description: Nautically inspired tools, built to last.
allParagraphs: Nautically inspired tools, built to last.
Designed for the ocean explorer. The Oceanus Brass Navigator's Loupe is a timeless magnifying instrument that blends modern engineering with the proven reliability of an iconic, classic design.
Machined from a brick of solid brass, The Navigator's Loupe brings sea-worthy design and functionality to your modern lifestyle. A rustproof, working tool, ready to go when you need it.

Built around an impact-resistant, biconvex, glass lens, the Navigator’s Loupe offers a fusion of past and present. Meticulous metalcraft protects the lens between rubber O-rings. Stainless steel hardware draws the instrument together.
Magnify important details on navigational charts or examine recently discovered treasures. With a 1.523 refractive index, the Navigator's Loupe’s lens offers a clear and crisp magnification.

A 1.8” aperture provides the concentrating power for emergency situations or to leave a mark, not soon forgotten. Whether you’re a sailor, an outdoorsman, or someone who appreciates quality, we believe you'll love the Navigator’s Loupe as much as we do.

The Navigator's Loupe has been manufactured to thrive over decades of use, through all of the conditions you intend to throw it through. What was once a labor of love, is now a timeless recycling instrument available for all, but we need your help to make this dream a reality.

Our products are steeply discounted off retail prices because we want to reward our very first customers. The opportunity to purchase a tool of this magnitude at this price is rare. With our finishing assembly and our master craftsmanship, the Navigator's Loupe, with your help, shall be accessible to all.
We stand behind the quality of our tools and the uniqueness and complexity of our hardware. Each piece has its own unique character that we hope will bring joy and nostalgia when put into action.

The Oceanus Brass Navigator's Loupe is currently spec'd to be as followed. As  with any project not yet complete, these dimensions may change slightly over time as we optimize our manufacturing systems and the tool's design. Also, because of your help we unlocked two stretch goals, resulting in the new dimensions as follows:
The versatility of the Bow-Shackle made it an indispensable tool on the seas, and it continues to impress today. Creativity is your only boundary when putting the Bow-Shackle to use.
The Bow-Shackle makes for a helpful attachment point. There’s no excuse for losing your Navigator's Loupe. You can easily attach it to your backpack, sailing jacket, or any outdoor equipment.

With our design roots in Boston, our company draws creative inspiration from the hub of America’s rich nautical history. In developing our products, our original prototypes and inspiration came from the old shipyards of East Boston.

The nautically-inspired Navigator's Loupe harkens back to a time of adventure on open seas, its durability a testament to the harsh demands of that bygone era. Our hardware is tied to the art and science of sailing and exploration. We’ve invested in refining the Navigator's Loupe into its final,  perfectly balanced form.
Inspired by nautical-grade hardware, the Navigator's Loupe is Oceanus's signature utility instrument. Its unique rich color and practical beauty are perfect for everyday use, travel, or adventure.

Since launching our first product, the Oceanus Brass - Bow Shackle Pen,  we are so proud to have been embraced by the ocean-loving community. Our backers can be found throughout the whole world, and they are equally present on social media! Below are a few of our favorite   excerpts of what our backers are saying about our products:

We launched Oceanus Brass because we wanted to share our nautically inspired tool with the world and turn an idea into action. A project that was both challenging and rewarding, the Oceanus Brass Navigator's Loupe is something we are very proud to share with you. We hope to encourage others to try their hand at something new just as we did, to build something of their own, to go through that exploration process of learning and bringing inspiration to fruition. We owe a great debt of gratitude to the many relationships we’ve built along the way with industrial designers and manufacturers who helped us push the boundaries of what we were told was possible.
Feel free to send us your stretch goal ideas!

title: Fridge Eye - Turn Your Fridge Into a Smart Fridge.
description: Streamline your trip to the grocery store by knowing exactly what you have and what you need.
allParagraphs: Streamline your trip to the grocery store by knowing exactly what you have and what you need.
Peek into your fridge on the go via our easy-to-use Fridge Eye smartphone app.
Fridge Eye connects to your home wi-fi and snaps a picture each time your fridge door is closed.
The United States Department of Agriculture recently found that the average American consumer wastes 225-290 pounds of food per year. That’s enough to feed 2 billion extra people annually.
Fridge Eye helps you stay green and reduce food waste.
ood waste amounts to a lot more than wasted money. It adds up to be a tremendous taxing of resources—land, water, energy, and supply chain assets that all contribute to global climate change.

Fridge Eye gives us all an easy way to do our part. We can not help ourselves consume our food at its freshest, but also help our neighbors. In a world where 10% of people are chronically undernourished, and where 15 million US households are food insecure, wasting food should not be ok. With FridgeEye, we can all do better.
Live Better Award Winner
The power-of-Fridge-Eye. Shopping-wisely-by-being-a-smarter-shopper.
Click on the image to earn cash rewards (15%) for pledges from your own referral link:
Use Fridge Eye in your pantry or cabinet, too. Anywhere with a door that you store food is the perfect fit.
* Batteries are rechargeable

brezzl. GmbH was founded in 2015 in Munich, Germany with the mission to provide products and services that solve customer’s problems in a new and smart way. In 2018,  brezzl. launched Cablewings , an innovative cable holder for chargers. We brought it to market and have shipped it all over the world. We received two design awards — the prestigious reddot in 2018, the German Design Award in 2019 and an Innovation Award from a large German media company.

Another success hallmark is the development and production of Fridge Eye which we're officially launching on Indiegogo.  With a high caliber and seasoned team,  we bring Fridge Eye to the world as an intelligent solution for the world's food waste problem.  

We can all make a difference in affecting change and it starts with you.  With your support and pledge, your help will allow us to deliver Fridge Eye as soon as possible. 

We believe in digitization to solve global problems and to deliver the best value for our clients.  With Fridge Eye, we can prove that technology can make us rethink and change our habits in the way we shop and store our food.  We can be smart about it, prevent waste, save time, money and our planet. 

Thank you for your support.

Vladislav is the Managing Director and CEO of brezzl.GmbH and is an expert in combining the latest technologies with user-friendly and minimalistic product design. He was a consultant for NTT DATA, BMW, AUDI, Frog Design, and Allianz and managed large-scale design and implementation projects.

Jump-start your car in just 3 seconds with the Aligoo Boost Series.
Aligoo Boost Series, where compact design meets colossal power.

Boost2000/Boost4000 offers unmatched engine versatility, starting engines up to 10L/8.0L. With reliable power and compact design, it's your go-to for any vehicle, ensuring you're always prepared on the road.

Aligoo Boost series isn't just a Jump Starter; it's also a versatile power bank for various scenarios. With the Aligoo Boost series, you get more than just a Jump Starter – you get a reliable power source for multiple situations.

Featuring a 45W Input Type-C port for efficient charging, a Type-C PD out port delivering an impressive 100W, and a USB QC 3.0 port offering 18W fast charging, the Boost series ensures you stay powered up wherever you go. Whether you're jump-starting your car or charging your devices on the go, the Boost series has got you covered.
The IP67 waterproof capability of the Aligoo Boost Series makes it an excellent companion for journeys. Whether it's raining or on damp ground, you can confidently use the Boost Series.

During travels, jump starters may encounter scenarios where water avoidance is crucial, such as rain, mud, and damp environments. The IP67 waterproof feature of the Aligoo Boost Series addresses these concerns, allowing you to meet your power needs without worry in moist conditions. From emergency starts in the rain to campsites soaked with dew, the Boost Series performs reliably, ensuring your journey is safe and worry-free.

The Aligoo Boost Series operates flawlessly in temperatures ranging from -4℉ to 140℉. Whether you're in the freezing cold of winter or the scorching heat of summer, this versatile jump starter and power bank ensures you have the power you need. Designed to withstand extreme conditions, the Boost Series is your dependable partner, no matter the weather.

The Aligoo Boost Series isn't just a Jump Starter; it also features a versatile LED light with four modes: High, Low, SOS, and Strobe. Whether you need bright light for nighttime repairs, low light for reading, or an emergency SOS signal, the Boost Series has you covered. The strobe function adds an extra layer of safety, making it a reliable companion in different situations. With these multiple lighting options, you can easily adapt to various lighting needs during your travels.

Boost Series includes a magnetic base, enabling you to attach the jump starter to your car's hood. This magnetic feature frees your hands, making it more convenient to work under the hood or handle other tasks requiring both hands. The Boost Series provides both illumination and ease of use, enhancing safety and efficiency during roadside emergencies.

title: Expand Our 3D Printing Shop with New Gear & Space
description: Support us in serving more of Vancouver Island by expanding with new gear and a larger 3D facility.
allParagraphs: Support us in serving more of Vancouver Island by expanding with new gear and a larger 3D facility.
Take 3D Printing Vancouver Island to the Next Level – Help Us Expand Van Isle 3D Printing!

Hello! My name is Mark T. Vicary, founder of Van Isle 3D Printing by XYZ Design Plastics, located in beautiful Campbell River, Vancouver Island, British Columbia, Canada – also known as the Salmon Fishing Capital of the World.

We’re on a mission to transform a passionate, small-scale 3D printing operation into a full-scale manufacturing facility that serves the local community, creative inventors, and industries across North America.
We’re seeking to raise $250,000 through this Indiegogo campaign to build a new, fully equipped shop and bring our innovative products and services to a much wider market.

Van isle 3D Printing was founded in 2019 as a retail gift shop within the Ocean Resort in Campbell River, bringing a new wave of West Coast-themed, 3D-printed products to locals and tourists alike bringing Vancouver Island 3D printing to the newest technologies availble on the market. But our roots go deeper — we are founded by XYZ Design Plastics, a prototyping and additive manufacturing business that began in Southern Ontario in 2012.

Since then, we’ve grown into a trusted provider of advanced 3D printing services, known especially for our custom work in the automotive industry, product development, and our ever-popular West Coast Wildlife Series.
Whether it’s custom car parts, branded merchandise, intricate figurines, or marketing displays, our work combines precision, art, and functionality.

We’ve reached the limits of what we can do in our 12' x 20' shop, where we currently operate 24 small-sized 3D printers. The demand for our services has outgrown our space and capabilities. Clients – including inventors, patent lawyers, and small businesses – are turning to us for product development and prototyping, and we’ve had to turn down large orders due to our limitations.
Your support will help us:

This is not a risky venture — it’s a scaling opportunity. We already have the business, the clients, the expertise, and the market. What we don’t have is the space or capital to meet the growing demand.
Van Isle 3D Printing specializes in both technical and artistic creations. Here’s a quick look at what we offer:
Business Card Holders – Customized to your business’s unique needs, blending function and style.
These products are available in gift shops across Vancouver Island and showcased on our website and Facebook page.
To thank our supporters, we’re offering a selection of unique 3D-printed products inspired by the beauty and spirit of Vancouver Island:
Each reward is valued from $25 - $125 CAD, with shipping included within Canada and the USA. For the rest of the world, shipping will be an additional $25 CAD.
More reward tiers and exclusive bundles will be announced as we gain traction — your support helps shape our future offerings!

There is no local facility on Vancouver Island currently offering the full range of services we aim to provide: 3D printing, prototyping, and small-batch injection molding all under one roof. We can become that resource for entrepreneurs, engineers, crafters, and small businesses from Victoria to Port Hardy — and beyond.
We also aim to create new jobs in the region and build strong partnerships with local educational institutions, inventors, and industries.

My name is Mark T. Vicary. I’ve worked in automotive manufacturing with Chrysler and have a background in glass aquarium design through my former company, Aquarium Technologies in Southern Ontario. I’ve worn many hats — entrepreneur, designer, manufacturer — and now, I’m ready to lead Van Isle 3D Printing into a bold new chapter.
While I’ve mostly run the business solo, I regularly collaborate with talented freelance designers. Now, I want to build a team and scale our services to meet the growing needs of the market.
Your support for our 3D printing funding campaignmakes a direct impact. Here’s how you can help bring this project to life:
With your help, we can make Van Isle 3D Printing the go-to hub for creativity, precision manufacturing, and West Coast innovation.
Join us, and let’s shape the future — layer by layer. Back us today, share our story, and be part of our 3D printing revolution.

Thank you,
Mark T. Vicary
Founder, Van Isle 3D Printing by XYZ Design Plastics

allParagraphs: Three Colors / Heat Management / Kickstand / Custom Nameplate/ 900D Nylon Protective Case

Introducing this Modcase, a revolutionary translucent back cover designed exclusively for the ROG Ally – the first of its kind globally. Immerse yourself in a world of personalized aesthetics with vibrant color options that unveil the intricate internal architecture of your ROG Ally. Imagine this: amidst a gathering of gamers, each flaunting the standard ROG Ally with its ordinary back cover, your ROG Ally steals the spotlight with the Modcase – a dazzling that not only turns heads but also elevates your gaming experience.

Now, let's dive into the full spectrum of this extraordinary product!

This Modcase does not come with screws, LT/RT buttons, and back buttons. It is compatible with the original screws, LT/RT buttons, and back buttons. Users can easily disassemble the original screws and then install them on this Modcase. We will provide disassembly and installation video soon.

Welcome to HandheldDIY, a gaming revolution ignited by hardcore gamers turned engineering maestros. In 2023, our founders, seasoned professionals from leading hardware companies, united in their unwavering love for gaming handhelds, took the plunge into entrepreneurship, birthing the cutting-edge brand - HandheldDIY. Our vision? To elevate your gaming experience, craft products tailored for gaming handheld enthusiasts.

Currently immersed in the realms of product definition, research, and development, our dedicated team is tirelessly working to unleash a range of awe-inspiring gaming accessories. HandheldDIY is not just a brand; it's a commitment to redefining the way you play. Join us on this journey, where innovation meets gaming passion, and gear up to craft your victory with HandheldDIY. Are you ready to level up?

Indulge in the ultimate gaming style with our stunning Modcase – a sleek masterpiece available in a variety of vibrant colors. Witness the unparalleled allure of the translucent matte material, providing a glimpse into the inner workings of your console like never before. Stand out from the crowd with the exclusive feature of transparency! Imagine the envy in the room as fellow players witness the vibrant colors and peer through the transparent matte material, revealing the inner workings of your console. Your ROG Ally becomes a statement piece, a conversation starter, setting you apart in the gaming community.

Experience craftsmanship and materials that rival the original back cover. Our meticulous attention to detail and premium materials elevate your gaming experience to new heights. Immerse yourself in the quality and sophistication that matches, or even surpasses, the original back cover.
World's first ROG Ally protective case crafted from 900D-grade nylon material, featuring a higher and glossier density for a sleek appearance.
Crystal ultra-soft velvet provides superior protection for the handheld.
The unique back mesh pocket design ensures slimness while offering convenient storage for small accessories.

Supercharge your ROG Ally with our built-in heat spreader and heat-dissipating silicone pads. Engineered for peak performance, this dynamic duo ensures efficient CPU cooling, banishing overheating concerns. Elevate your gaming experience with a gaming handheld that stays cool under pressure, unlocking unparalleled performance. It's time to level up, break boundaries, and redefine gaming excellence.

Whether in maximum fan speed mode or low-power mode, this Modcase significantly enhances CPU performance by reducing temperatures. Compared to the original back cover, it boasts an impressive 15% increase in performance in high-speed mode and a remarkable 16.4% boost in low-power mode.

Our team is tirelessly working on refining the prototype's cooling performance, primarily focusing on optimizing the size of the heat dissipation panel openings. This ongoing enhancement ensures that the mass-production version will deliver even greater heat dissipation efficiency.

Experience gaming liberation with the Modcase's built-in aluminum alloy foldable kickstand, allowing gamers to place their ROG Ally on any tabletop, freeing up their hands for an immersive gaming experience. But that's not all – this versatile kickstand goes beyond convenience. With the added feature of a silicone strap, you can effortlessly secure a power bank to the Modcase, enabling on-the-go charging anytime, anywhere.

Elevate your gaming identity with the Modcase's aluminum alloy nameplate, a personalized touch that speaks volumes. Engrave your name onto this sleek insignia, transforming your ROG Ally into a unique masterpiece that reflects your individuality. It's not just a gaming accessory; it's a canvas for personal expression. Showcase your personality, stand out in the gaming realm, and let the world know that this isn't just any gaming handheld – it's uniquely yours.

As a brand committed to elevating your gaming experience, HandheldDIY introduces a diverse array of add-ons crafted specifically for gaming enthusiasts. Choose from our range of products designed to enhance and personalize your gaming journey.

title: Small Leather or Fabric Wallet. RFID Protection
description: Small Leather or Fabric Wallet| RFID Protection| BORDO mini
allParagraphs: Small Leather or Fabric Wallet| RFID Protection| BORDO mini

This is true, that to create something really great is extremely difficult. However, you need to start with something. Such a beginning for us was the first version of Bordo mini in 2015. It was a very simple, but at the same time, quite a good wallet, which many liked.

We successfully delivered all the rewards and with new forces rushed into improvements and perfections. That way the second version was born. This project also became successful, but our product didn’t receive great popularity. But I had anticipation ... A feeling, that it was just the beginning. This is not just “another wallet”. This is probably the best wallet in the world, it just needs to be improved a little more. And we got to work again...

As a result, in 2017 a new wallet was born, which received great support. It was amazing! Honestly, we even stopped the advertising campaign after the first two weeks. Why? We were just afraid not to cope. In contrast to our past project, when we had only 130 backers, there were more than 100 in the new one only for the first day! But despite all the difficulties, we coped with this and delivered the best wallets to each of our backers. Then we organized sales through our website. Our business was going not bad :) But we can’t live in peace. What do you think we did? We again started to improve and refine our favorite wallet.

To tell the truth, the creation of this project was not very easy for us. In total, we spent almost a year on all the works. The tasks that we faced were more difficult than we thought, and some seemingly trivial things were very difficult to accomplish. What motivated us all this time? It's you! The person, who writes that can’t wait for our wallet. The one, who says that his son has taken away his own wallet because it is so cool and he wants to order another one. All your feedback is a huge charge of motivation and energy for us.
Where are our backers from!

Bordo mini is a wallet that has many advantages! Let's find out about each of them in order :) Its size is the first thing that surprises people who see this miracle for the first time. It isn’t bigger than a credit card. Only 7 cm x 9.5 cm ≈ 2.76 inch x 3.74 inch.

You remember how pockets fully packed with different staff don’t look nicely. With Bordo mini this won’t be possible. With Bordo mini you can go both to the beach and to the official reception. And don’t worry! You can always find a place to hide it.
The size of Bordo mini allows you to place any world currency. If in doubt, don’t worry, just email us and we will make a test video for you.
Bordo mini is very convenient to use even in a half-open state. It makes it even easier and faster to interact with the wallet.
It may seem to you that it isn’t very convenient, but it is not true. You quickly get used to it and after a while, you even don’t understand how it was before!
Even when the Bordo mini is closed, you have quick access to any of your cards. This minimizes the time to search for a desired card.

We should also pay attention to the spaciousness of the Bordo mini. At first glance it may seem that this baby doesn’t place much, but you are mistaken: you can even carry 20 bills and 10 cards without problems.
Therefore, both right-handed and left-handed versions are available. We think it is very unfair that most wallets are made only for right-handers.
This wallet is the most functional. You have the choice between two additional slots: a card slot or a coin slot. Choose what you like more!
And another nice bonus! Bordo mini can be used easily with one hand! It's so convenient!
Bordo mini is developed in two designs, which differ not only in materials, but also in structural elements. Let's learn more about each of them.

Leather design. The wallet is made of genuine high-quality Italian leather with a thickness of 1.4 - 1.6 mm. It is made in four calm colors: black, gray, brown, beige. It will perfectly supplement your outfit and can be combined with other leather products of your wardrobe. A sophisticated appearance will allow to take it even for a very official and solemn event.

Fabric design. The wallet is made of dense wear-resistant fabric with a polyurethane water-repellent finish. It is ideal for outstanding outfits, or vice versa - in a strict style it will create a bright highlight. This wallet attracts attention, it will be a key element of your image.

Manufacturing BORDO mini consists of many processes and stages. Some of them, of course, we try to replace by machine work, only if it is appropriate. But still, how many moments are done by the master! Furthermore, the most important thing in BORDO mini are the best materials and accessories. No need to say that a good impression of a nice design can be easily spoiled by cheap materials.

Genuine Italian leather (leather design). All the time of our existence we work with this material. And during this time it didn’t let us down once. This is really beautiful and at the same time very practical material.

High quality fabric (fabric design). Dense fabric with a water-repellent finish. You don’t need to worry about its durability, because it is mainly used for the tailoring of special working clothes in high-intensity labor conditions.
Felt (fabric design). A semi-natural material that is used in BORDO mini to give it density and desired shape. We tried a lot of materials on this role, but felt coped best.

RFID protection. This is something that must be in every wallet. With BORDO mini you can be confident in the safety of your personal data. The entire wallet, except for the extra card slot or coin slot, is RFID protected!
High-quality fabric with a pattern of «tartan». Well, this is the brand element of BORDO mini.

High-quality fittings. We experimented a lot with the world brands of fittings, but now we stopped at the zipper from the company YKK and buttons of Prime. After all, this is one of the most important parts of Bordo mini, which will provide a long period of use of the wallet!

Tastes differ. We don’t know your preferences, so we give you the complete freedom for creating something perfect for you! You can choose between fabric and leather design, which have their own colors. Your wallet can be opened to the right or left. Moreover, there is a choice of an additional slot: a card slot or a slot for coins. All this you can choose in the survey after the completion of the project!

We are a small but purposeful team of like-minded people from Ukraine, who work every day, creating without modesty the best wallet in the world. Now is our time. We have a lot of experience, successful projects behind us and thousands of satisfied customers around the world. And I think our journey is just beginning! We need a little more of your support!
Join now! The most interesting is yet to come!

To tell the truth, the creation of this project was not very easy for us. In total, we spent almost a year on all the works. The tasks that we faced were more difficult than we thought, and some seemingly trivial things were very difficult to accomplish. What motivated us all this time? It's you! The person, who writes that can’t wait for our wallet. The one, who says that his son has taken away his own wallet because it is so cool and he wants to order another one. All your feedback is a huge charge of motivation and energy for us!

title: C.R.- Mfee
description: A New source of energy that is 99% environmental friendly, through magnetic force engineering.
allParagraphs: A New source of energy that is 99% environmental friendly, through magnetic force engineering.

The C.R.-Mfee. (Chain Reaction Magnetic Force Engineering Energy.) And it all started with the inspiration of the 9/11, in how in the 21st century with such advance technology, elevators/lifts on high rise buildings could still not be used in an emergency, that really upset me so much, that I decided to find a way to make it possible to be safe enough in order to be used in an emergency, in order to save more lives. I knew that if it were possible, there would only be one man in history that could make it possible, and that would be the great Nikola Tesla. Therefor I took it upon myself to study the great man I so much heard about and his work, where I now have copies of over 1,200 pages of his work and over 200 of his patents, and from his inspiration and work, the C.R.-Mfee was born, taking over twenty years before I had a breakthrough in 2022. I have evidence on video with the models I have created to show the full potential of the C.R.-Mfee that shows that it does work on a 99% accuracy, but until I build a prototype I cannot work out the other missing 1%, and this is why I need enough funds to hire a private place to work on and enough materials to create some kind of a prototype.
I Prefer the C.R.-Mfee to belong to the people than to the private sector.

In return for you help in funding my work, you will get 10 shares for every pound invested, where those shares will become legal equity once the company is registered or if the invention is bought by the private sector, where they will then have to buy the shares for a minimum of ten pounds, British sterling for every share that has been given to those who have invested in the C.R.-Mfee.
If some people can't contribute, that is ok, but that doesn't mean they can't help, as their help in someway or another will contribute towards the C.R.-Mfee success.
such as: getting the word out and make some noise about my campaign, and in sharing my crowd funding link.
Search C.R.-Mfee on GOOGLE for website and youtube video, and Facebook.

title: XA360 mobility board. Move better, get stronger
description: Rotating fitness mobility board for Pilates, training, physical therapy, golf for strength & stretch
allParagraphs: Rotating fitness mobility board for Pilates, training, physical therapy, golf for strength & stretch

Hi, my name is Nancy and I'm the inventor of patent pending XA360 Mobility board. I'm a Pilates instructor, personal trainer, fascia stretch and corrective exercise specialist, dietitian/nutrition coach, holistic lifestyle/stress and sleep management coach and Reiki master. My experiences in the health and wellness field allowed me to develop a tool that not only enhances physical performance but also improves alignment, flexibility and overall mobility.

I have worked with thousands of people and almost all of them had the same things in common: hard time activating certain muscles. imbalances in the body, tightness and loss of flexibility and balance. They were in constant pain, taking medications or needing physical therapy or surgery. Working as a Pilates instructor and Personal trainer, I saw too many people doing exercises incorrectly, using wrong muscles, using momentum or lack of control in movement. My dedication to helping individuals move better to get stronger was the driving force behind XA360.

XA360 is short for ACSSA, which is my unique method of training: Activate, Control, Strengthen, Stretch and Align. XA360, an innovative fitness tool designed to redefine the way people approach mobility, strength and overall wellness that can be used on the floor or on the Pilates reformer or chair. It is designed to promote proper movement patterns and alignment. Equipped with a unique rotating mechanism, the board provides instant feedback when the user's movement is incorrect, or their weight distribution is uneven. The challenge? Keep the board as still as possible, thereby encouraging the user to fine-tune their form and enhance control.

But the XA360 isn't just about correction - it's about transformation. Purposefully rotating the board allows the users to achieve deeper stretches, unlocking new levels of flexibility and mobility. Whether you're building core strength, improving balance or enhancing flexibility, XA360 is fitness all-in-one solution. This groundbreaking board offers unparalleled versatility and precision, making it a must-have for the fitness enthusiasts, athletes and physical therapy professionals alike.

I have a passion for Pilates and fitness and helping people.  Your support will make my vision of helping people move better, get stronger and feel better a reality. By helping people with better body awareness, increase strength, balance and flexibility and minimize imbalances in the body, it helps prevent injuries and surgeries thus improving quality of life.
VERSATILITY of XA360 Board

Pilates: XA 360 Board can be used on the Pilates reformer, Cadillac, chair and on the mat. Most classical and contemporary exercise can be done on the board but using less spring tension than usual. It takes your Pilates to the next level. Instead of having to come up with new exercises, be challenged more by using the board.

Training: Feel the burn in your muscles by using slow controlled movements rather than going heavier. Let your muscles do the work instead of your joints. XA360 board helps you focus on your form instead of using momentum. Standing on the board while doing upper body exercises helps work the functional muscles in your legs.

Physical Therapy: Strengthen your muscles pre and post operation, increase flexibility and range of motion with XA360 board. Learn how to use the board from your physical therapist an continue using at home for faster recovery.
Golf: Strengthen and stretch the muscles that help with your swing and rotation for a more powerful golf swing. Stretch before and after your game to increase flexibility and prevent injuries

Fascia Stretch: Purposefully rotating the board helps to get into deeper stretches while activating the muscles and increases flexibility and range of motion. Great for people who are tight and have difficulty getting down and up on the floor and limited range of motion.
What We Need:

I currently have a working prototype and am doing a pre-launch to raise $50K in capital for manufacturing, advertising, technology and development of fitness app on how to use the board. I'm doing a pre-sale of XA360 to have enough orders to start manufacturing in June 2025 and hoping to ship by mid-August 2025.
What You Get:
Please help me get the word out and share with your friends and family on social media. Any support will be greatly appreciated. THANK YOU!!!

title: CaliberX Multi-tool : TRUE man has it
description: Authenticity! Caliber X – has it. A true man will recognize that.
allParagraphs: Authenticity! Caliber X – has it. A true man will recognize that.
Sure, you can lug around a heavy and cumbersome toolbox everywhere you go, but why would you, when you can replace practically the entire box with this one multi-tool?
Be smart. Invest in a tool that captures your real need.
Caliber X -the ultimate combination of style, functionality, and price. Engineered with practicality in mind, designed for single-handed accessibility.
Extremely lightweight, you may forget that you are carrying it in your pocket. Ergonomic dream come true. Comfortable, secure, and stylish.
We created a tool that will fit perfectly into your lifestyle. A tool that will fit perfectly in your pocket and will look good in your hand. A tool for a true man.

A truly must-have piece for sailors, hikers, for those who love camping, road trips, or DIY projects. You should have it in your car, on your motorcycle, bicycle, boat, or backpack. It will be a tool that you would love to use. Not just because it looks so COOL, but also because it’s perfect for every 21st-century man activities.

You may think it comes from a new era of Terminator or Matrix, but we designed the CALIBER for those adventures type of man that understand the values of Aquaman or Superman! We definitely put more in it than you may think.
*Make sure to include them in your pledge when you back-up our project.
**Add-ons will not incur any extra shipping costs for you. This one is on us!
Step 1: Select the perk you want to get.
Step 2: Click on the "GET THIS PERK" button.
Step 3: Scroll down on the next screen at the Add-on section. You will see all available Add-ons for the selected Perk.
Step 4: Select the desired Add-on and on the pop-up window click on the "CONTINUE TO PAYMENT" button.
Step 5: Chose another Add-on if you want, taking the same actions as in Step 4 above.
Step 6: After you've selected all the Add-ons you want, scroll up and click on the button "PROCEED TO PAYMENT" on the right side.
Step 7: Fill in all the required info (name, delivery address, etc.), agree with the Terms of Use, and click on "SUBMIT PAYMENT".

We put a lot of thought into this one product. We designed it for us and for those who appreciate a real practical tool with a beautifully shaped skeleton. We took our time to test, experiment, do focus groups, and search for the best steel and the best team to make this product come true. We hope our backers will enjoy the product and we promise that in case of delays caused by manufacturing, delivery, or any other issues, we will keep you updated, informed, and will be thankful for your understanding. All the true fellows out there, we hope for your support. Let’s get this Caliber in every pocket. Thank you.
Long-lasting design
CaliberX is made from solid stainless steel and due to its robust structure, will be very hard, if not impossible to break.
Reusability and recyclability
To make sure you can pass your CaliberX to the next generation, the product has been designed in such a way to allow 15 out of the 18 tools to be replaced. It's made to last you a lifetime.
Sustainable materials

We believe in economic sustainability and care a lot about the environment. By using 100% metal in CaliberX construction, we've removed all of the over-molded plastics and multi-material designs that are so common in today's tools.
Share our campaign with your friends here on Indiegogo and everywhere. It really helps a lot. The hardest part is getting the word out. Thanks so much for taking the time to check us out.
You can always get in touch with us:

Facebook Private Group - https://www.facebook.com/groups/742402582968385
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/tools_mule
Webpage - https://toolsmule.com/
Email - hello@toolsmule.com

title: Empowering women youth on skills clean energy tech
description: Empowering African women and youth through digital skills, clean energy, and inclusive technology.
allParagraphs: Empowering African women and youth through digital skills, clean energy, and inclusive technology.
Empowering Women and Youth in Africa Through Technology, Clean Energy & Entrepreneurship
At DoHelps & VidaHelps Foundation, we believe that digital access is a human right—and we’re on a mission to bridge the digital divide across Africa.
We're working directly with underserved women and youth, equipping them with the skills, tools, and support they need to thrive in today’s tech-driven world.
Our Solution: FemTech Digital Hub + DOVIDAX Mobile Platform
We’ve launched a powerful ecosystem that delivers real-world impact through:
Microsoft-certified training in AI, cybersecurity, and digital literacy
Lease-to-own smartphones and affordable internet access
Mentorship and entrepreneurship programs to spark small businesses
Solar-powered tools for healthcare, education, and smart farming
A digital marketplace that gives local products and services global reach
We’re officially registered in Nigeria, Portugal, and the United States, and we proudly align our work with the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

We’ve already begun collaborating with global partners like Microsoft, and we’re in talks with the African Development Bank to scale our model across São Tomé & Príncipe, Angola, Cape Verde, and beyond.
Why We Need Your Help
Your donation will directly support:
Training 10,000+ women and youth in digital skills and entrepreneurship
Providing smartphones and internet to low-income families
Promoting clean energy and climate-smart agriculture in rural communities
Creating jobs and building sustainable, community-led businesses
This isn’t just charity. It’s a movement to build a digitally inclusive, economically empowered Africa—starting from the grassroots.
How You Can Help
Every dollar brings someone closer to opportunity:
$25 can provide a young person with internet for a month
$100 sponsors a digital training scholarship
$250 helps a woman entrepreneur access solar-powered tools and mentorship
Donate today. Share our mission. Be part of the solution.

Learn more:
www.dohelpsandvidahelps.com | www.dov...

Follow our journey:

title: Water for Life: Help Our Crops Survive
description: Drought is killing our crops. Help us restore water access and save our farm.
allParagraphs: Drought is killing our crops. Help us restore water access and save our farm.
Revive Our Farm: Help Us Save Our Crops and Water the Future
?‍? From Portugal, With Soil-Stained Hands and Hope

We are a small agricultural company based in Portugal and Moldova, dedicated to growing honest, healthy food: tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, and garlic — with our hands in the dirt and our hearts in the harvest.
For years, our produce has reached markets and families across Romania, Germany, France, Portugal and Poland, feeding thousands with high-quality, natural vegetables grown on family land.
But now… we are facing our biggest crisis yet.
? Why We Need Your Help
This season, extreme weather and drought have devastated our fields. Water channels are dry. Wells are shallow. And the heat won’t stop.
Every morning we walk the fields — and every day, more plants are gone.
We are not just losing crops — we’re losing the chance to survive as a business and continue serving Europe with real, homegrown produce.
? What We’re Fighting For
We are launching this campaign to raise funds to:
? Clean and restore water channels
⛏ Drill deep water wells for long-term irrigation
? Install basic pumping systems to stabilize water supply
This is not just an investment in a farm — it’s an investment in sustainable agriculture, in food security, and in protecting small producers from disappearing.
? Why It Matters
If small farmers vanish, industrial agriculture will take over — pushing prices up and quality down. We believe in a different future. A real one.
We still believe in:
Ethical farming
Local food systems
Environmental responsibility
Generational knowledge
Community support
With your help, we can turn things around.
? What You’re Supporting
Your contribution supports:
A real farming family fighting against climate and economic pressure
A clean water infrastructure to serve this and future seasons
The continued supply of affordable, honest vegetables to European homes
The protection of farmland and rural jobs
❤️ Every Drop Counts
This is our only chance to save this season — and maybe even the farm.
Whether you donate €5 or €500 — you are helping to water the soil, protect our plants, and fuel a story of resilience and real food.
Join us. Be part of this campaign. Help us bring life back to our fields — and keep fresh food on your table.
With deep gratitude,

title: BIORESTORE
description: ONE WASH RESTORE YOUR GARMENTS TO NEW
allParagraphs: ONE WASH RESTORE YOUR GARMENTS TO NEW

What if you could sustainably, easily restore your legendary concert t-shirt, your ex’s hoodie they left, your dad's perfect shirt finally handed down, your kid's favorite sweater, the dress that defined your 20’s or the precious first day garments that your baby came home in.
From an idea to a reality - even the early stage prototype tests provided excellent results, such as the hoodie above from Anna and her son Alfred.

We all have that worn out favourite garment sitting in our closet. A piece of clothing with so many good memories, that’s been lost to time, the color faded, the surface rough, bobbled, pilled, the hems and cuffs stretched and shapeless.
What if there was a way to restore them simply and sustainably?
We’ve tried and tested ALL the ‘’solutions’’ including garment shavers, softeners, razors, brighteners, scissors, combs, sticky tape, detergents, sand paper, pumice stones, elbow grease and more.
BIORESTORE replaces all of these tedious and time consuming tools with a simple, sustainable, scientific and smart solution.

To create an easy to use solution we were inspired by the simplicity of your regular washing detergents. Our team have spent the past two years perfecting and simplifying the process & product.  Think of BIORESTORE  as detergent 2.0 or as a 're-tergent' - restoring, refreshing and renewing instead of simply cleaning.

BIORESTORE is a Retergent which removes pilling / Lint / Garment Fuzz /Bobbles from the surface, which improves the colour brilliance, realigns the fibres, and reshapes the macro structure - ultimately meaning the shape of the garment.
On a fabric level the improvement to textiles looks like the above examples, whilst on a garment, the improvement is dramatic.

Why do clothes wear out? Whether your wardrobe is made up of mass market fashion staples, high-end pieces worn once in a while, or a daily uniform of sorts, the same thing always happens: over time, repeated washing with detergents and regular wearing means friction, abrasion and stretching of your clothing. This leads to pilling, de-shaping, and faded appearance of colors through a negative process of wear and tear called fibrillation.

On a macro and a micro level, fibrillation is bad news for garments, with fibrillations  becoming visible on the surface of the garment as pills / lint / fluff / bobbles. These lead to colours looking dull, prints appearing faded, the surface no longer soft, smooth or with a sheen, the cuffs and collars become stretched & worn, and the overall fit of the garment becomes shapeless and loose. Simply put, your clothing does not look like it did the moment your eyes and hands met your favorite garment for the first time.

It’s easy to assume your garment is beyond repair and it’s time to purchase a replacement. However, the original garment & colour you loved isn’t gone. It’s simply hidden under a thin layer of accumulated fibre bundles that obscure both the original colour and fabric surface texture. Underneath this micro mass is a garment waiting for a second chance and to avoid the bottomless pit of global landfill.
Enzymes are available in abundance in nature, acting as catalysts that speed up processes of transformation and conversion in billions of natural and organic processes.

For example, the coffee and juice you drank and breakfast you ate this morning are being digested, broken down and doing there magic in your stomach, converting to energy all with the help of enzymes.
The biggest benefit of enzymes is that they are smart, really smart, only activating under suitable conditions and deactivating when those conditions are removed or are not optimal.

Simply put, during optimal conditions at 40°C / 104°F the movement and agitation of a home laundry wash with BIORESTORE, the active enzyme ingredients identify, target and remove the damaged, problem causing Pilling / Lint / Fluff Fibres on the garment surface and deep inside the fabric structure.

We know your curious, so here's the science, once the enzymes have targeted these fibres, an enzymatic hydrolysis reaction weakens these fibres from the main structure, the force from the washing machine removed loose fibres restoring the garment. Its like a lock and key, one is designed for the other, and the lock (your garment) won’t open without the key (BIORESTORE enzymes.). This is why our product only works with cotton & cotton blends.
And whats great for us, and good for you to know is that all of the BIORESTORE ingredients have been approved by EU and US regulatory authorities.
BIORESTORE is a retergent made with enzymes and consciously selected ingredients.

In comparison to other Laundry Products often containing up-to 29 ingredients, BIORESTORE is limited & minimal formulation of 6 essential ingredients only. Unlike traditional laundry products, we have refrained from adding chemicals just for the sake of aesthetics.

For example, the colour of the BIORESTORE powder is chalky, which comes from a conscious decision to skip any whitening agents, therefore keeping the purest, simplest, and most minimal form of the product.
It additionally means that the powder contains no fragrance - only a very faint, neutral smell that won’t leave any scent behind on your garment.

Crucially, compared to traditional laundry solutions, BIORESTORE does not contain any silicons, softeners or optical brighteners, that bond with the fabric and deposit a layer of chemicals on the surface of your clothes.
For full transparency we share our ingredients list with you, which have been fully certified and approved by both EU and US regulatory authorities.
Ingredients:
< 5% Ethoxylated fatty alcohol. 10-60% granulated enzymes, sodium sulphate.   > 5 - 15% Non ionic tensioniser, sodium citrate,  adipic acid.

To get here, we started with garments at the end of their life and worked our way backwards. By this we mean, we started with our own worn-out clothes and our direct experience of witnessing textile waste in landfills all around the world.
While we knew that these mountains of wasted garments could be repurposed or recycled, we wondered if they could instead be renewed and restored.

With over 25 years of experience from the fashion, textile and material science's industry, with deep knowledge of working with textile chemistry and technology from laundry to lab and factory floor to design studio we understood and shared the frustration of loosing favorite garments to time.
To solve this, we did what we know best - we studied the yarns, inspected the garment failures, crunched the numbers and analysed the data to develop a solution which we call BIORESTORE.
It's simple, sustainability, and for us quite naturally our first thought is always - sustainability.

Let's start with the disposal and destruction - The US alone, dumps  17 million tons of textile waste each year, that’s the equivalent of 75,000+ Statue of Liberty’s, towering over NYC bleeding chemicals, dyes and effluent into the environment, slowly breaking down over 100’s of years.

Secondly is the massive consumption of materials and resources in the production of new clothing on a rapidly increasing cyclical scale of consumption. This footprint to produce simple items like a T-shirt is huge, and destructive towards natural habitats and systems, with a a t-shirt requiring upto 3500 litres of water in its journey from cotton plant to finished and store ready goods.

We could go on, presenting more and more shocking statistics, however the simple fact is that we all buy, consume and dispose of far too many items of clothing when they could be easily, simply and sustainably renewed and restored.

BIORESTORE has been in development for several years. From the initial prototype until now, it has been thoroughly tested on all types of textile products and materials in exactly the same way we would carry out tests whilst developing products for the large brands.

While all the elements in developing BIORESTORE were selected consciously based on their safety & eco attributes we went a step further. BIORESTORE was independently evaluated by a globally renown lab - INTERTEK achieving both REACH (EU) and EPA TSCA & California Prop 65 US safety standards

With our deep knowledge in textile technology, we have utilized internationally recognized textile testing mechanisms to capture the improvement in pilling and colour vibrancy. This has been measured through colour spectrometry and can be viewed on a microscopic level, and of course with visually as improvement of the garments surface and color.

Once satisfied with the results in a controlled environment, we went out and created a trial group of over 150 people both inside and outside of Sweden who then tested the product in their own home laundry machines.

The simple-to-use BIORESTORE home laundry solution has been designed to work in a similar way to regular home laundry detergents. There the similarities end, and the patent pending science of BIORESTORE Retergent begins.
Each box of BIORESTORE can restore upto 5-6 adult garments of 10 children garments or a total weighing upto 1kg of textiles.
Our simple visual guide below will help you to calculate the weight of garments.
BIORESTORE is not always a miracle worker, and there are certain things BIORESTORE can’t fix including:
BIORESTORE is created for use on cotton and cotton blended fabrics, meaning any garment that is from 100% Cotton to 50% Cotton blended with other fibres.
BIORESTORE is suitable for use across a wide range of garments and textile products, below is just a few of our favorite prodcuts to BIORESTORE.

BIORESTORE has been designed to work with cotton and cotton blends, as this is a huge part of the clothing that we wear. This means that  BIORESTORE will not work on 100% synthetic fibres, or animal fibres such as wool, cashmere or silk.
If you do wash synthetic- or animal fibre-based garments, not to worry. Your garments won't get damaged, they just won't be restored  in the the same way cotton garments will be.
Where garments are made with a blend of fibres ie. cotton and wool, or cotton and polyester, the cotton will be restored and the other fibres will not be affected or damaged in any way.
Visit our website:
www.bio-restore.com
Help us spread the word:
Press Contact
