title: NOVA: The Ultimate 4-in-1 Wireless Power Bank
description: Nova aims to provide you with a FAST, truly wireless, future-proofed, ultra-portable power bank.
allParagraphs: Nova aims to provide you with a FAST, truly wireless, future-proofed, ultra-portable power bank.
1. Wireless Charger - Nova is equipped with a 10W wireless charger, perfect for quick charging most smartphones today (iPhone - 7.5W, Android - 10W+).

2. PD USB-C Port* - This port takes full advantage of the fast charging capabilities of USB-C. Built to safely provide 18W of power and equipped with Power Delivery (PD), this port can charge any smartphone to at least 50% in about half an hour.

3. USB-3.0 Port - We designed Nova with ease of use in mind and also included a Qualcomm® 3.0 Quick Charge™ USB port. It's perfect for those who need to fast charge a second device via a standard USB connection.
* Don't have a USB-C charging cable? One of our stretch goals is a $5 rebate to buy a USB-C cable of your choice! See below for more info.
One of Nova's standout features is its built-in foldable wall plug. This purposefully designed mechanism lets you refuel Nova's battery at any wall outlet, requiring zero cables to do so.

And it doesn't stop there- you can continue to charge your other devices through Nova while it's plugged in. With the inclusion of a Power Delivery USB-C port, you can even use Nova as a wall charger for your USB-C tablet or laptop (Must be under 18W).

Nova's ultra portable design makes the perfect everyday carry companion. Don't let its small size fool you, Nova also has a mighty battery capacity of 8000 mAh. That's more than enough to get you through your day even if you start your day with a dead phone!

Nova is perfect for carrying in small bags and backpacks. Its battery capacity is FAA approved for all carry-ons when traveling by air. You can find a wall outlet almost anywhere you go thus allowing you to re-charge Nova whenever or wherever you may need. Super convenient, right?

Here's a brief overview of what's been done, and what is yet to come. While we can only give you an estimate of how long manufacturing might take, we will do our very best to stick to the deadlines we have set. Please note that this timeline does not take into account how long the devices will take to get to your doorstep. For international customers in certain countries where it  may apply, Bourge Design does not pay for any extra fees or taxes (VAT or GST) necessary to receive the delivery. That is the sole responsibility of the customer.
With your backing, not only will you be receiving one of the most sophisticated pieces of technology to enter the game of portable charging, you'll be:

Today, Nova is ready for liftoff and we can ensure that it's on doorsteps by the end of the year with your help! We have decided to offer heavily discounted prices for your early support and hope that you take advantage as the prices will rise as soon as the campaign ends. We invite you to experience Nova with us.
Thanks for looking!!
-The Bourge Design Team

title: THE SMART DEVICE FOR HYDROPONICS AND AQUAPONICS
description: AquaShield is the Smart Home System for your Indoor Farm or Greenhouse
allParagraphs: AquaShield is the Smart Home System for your Indoor Farm or Greenhouse

In 2018 we launched our first product on Kickstarter and it was an instant success. Since then we shipped 50 AquaShield units worldwide and received a ton of feedback from our backers. Based on these, we improved almost every part of the AquaShield.

It tracks all important environmental parameters like PH, EC, temperature, humidity, light intestity, VPD, dew point and much more. With AquaShield, you can automate your hydroponic or aquaponic system: you can control grow lights, pumps, valves or any other active component. The device is capable to connect to the internet, so you can access your AquaShield anytime, anywhere.
Produce high quality crops using automation. AquaShield helps you to save time, reduce cost and work more efficiently. AquaShield can control 8 devices (grow lights, pumps, fans etc.) simultaneously.
AquaShield 2.0 can also host PWM (pulse width modulation) enabled dosing pumps, LED grow lights, servos and much more.
For an easier use, we also developed our own dosing pumps, that can easily control your PH (use PH+ or PH-) or maintain the optimal EC by adding nutrients based on the AquaShield’s EC readings.
The in-house developed software tracks all sensors real-time, stores all data and alerts you if needed.
Monitoring features of the AquaShield Connect: sensors, graphs and calibration
Controlling features of the AquaShield Connect: activate relays and dosing pump setup
Automation with the AquaShield Connect: Time and sensor based workflows and alerting features

AquaShield 2.0 is commercial ready, but we need your help to ramp up production. AquaShield has 9 different PCB boards that only could be manufactured economically if we order in larger quantities. With larger order quantities we can also negotiate better prices for the housing and sensors, so we will have more money to spend on further development of the device and the software.
Please be aware that all shipping costs, VAT and sales taxes will be collected after the campaign is over.

We’re a Budapest, Hungary based company, so we will ship all perks from Hungary. Taxes will vary depending on where we deliver the perks. We have to charge VAT, if your shipping address is in the European Union.

In other cases - for example if you back us from the United States - we won’t charge any taxes, however sales taxes and custom fees may apply, might be levied on your parcel. The charge of the fees depends on the customs office / specific local post office of the destination country.
Below you can see the estimated shipping costs based on our latest data.
We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:
MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production.
FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can't be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay.

We are using TNT and FedEx to get our products to you. We'll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it's going to get to you. Please feel free to contact us we are here to help!

title: Travel Tool Roll To Organize Your Toiletries
description: The most loved toiletries travel roll is back and even better!
allParagraphs: The most loved toiletries travel roll is back and even better!

Tashtego is the ultimate solution to the long-suffering toiletries bag. Inspired by the neat and organized design of tool rolls, Tashtego is a clean, sanitary, minimalist way to organize and store all your travel essentials.
Say goodbye to hair in toothbrushes and exploded shampoo over your razor. With Tashtego, all your brushes, razors, and bottles are securely separated from each other and easy to find.
Roll up all your personal care tools in a neat, organized, easily displayable kit. Never search for your toiletries again!

Tashtego 2.0 is an better, more functional version of our first design. We read all the reviews (both positive and negative) and worked with a group of our most die-hard fans to reinvent, enhance, and improve our 1.0 product.
If you’ve ever travelled, you know the pain of carrying your hygiene essentials. Ziploc bags get messy and gross - and the “high end” toiletry bags are even worse...
Everything mixes together, gets lost, and leaks all sorts of goo, gunk, and grossness over the very tools you use to clean yourself.
Do you enjoy digging through the black hole of toiletries?
How about your toothbrush having a three-way with your hairbrush and toe nail clippers?
Or your shampoo spilling all over your essentials?
Are you tired of sorting through junk just to find your personal hygiene tools dirty and disgusting?
It’s time for a change.
Tashtego keeps all your toiletries separate and organized. No more digging and no more inappropriate make out sessions between hygiene items.
Mesh pockets keep your essentials neatly organized and easy to find - so you can grab what you need when you need them. Plus, you can lay Tashtego flat or hang it up for easy access.
All Your Essentials Organized
Lay flat or hang!
Camping, backpacking, vacations, business trips, festivals, retreats and more - Tashtego is perfect for any and every travel situation.
Throw it in your bag or suitcase without worry. You’ll save space while keeping your toiletries safe from each other and the rest of your bag.
Tashtego 2.0 also expands and contracts based on what you put in it. Save extra space if you’re leaving for a weekend and pack extra for that long vacation.
Plus, Tashtego 2.0 makes TSA easy to pass! Simply pull it out for screening. Your items will be easily and fully displayed for the TSA agent - no worries, no hassle, no mess.
Tashtego 2.0 is made from heavy-duty, high-strength nylon. This makes it ultra-durable, ultra-light, and 100% waterproof. Plus, the exterior is soft and nice to the touch.
If you ever need to wash it, just rinse it down in the sink or throw it in the washing machine.
Tashtego 2.0 is completely machine washable!

We replaced our canvas pockets with durable, unidirectional stretchable mesh pockets. This lets you easily see all your content and makes Tashtego more secure and versatile. Carry your full-size toothbrush, toothpaste, floss, hairbrush, razor, everything without worry.
You can even store items smaller than the pocket! They’ll still be safely secured thanks to the mesh lining.
Because they only stretch one way, our pockets will never stretch out on you. This means you don’t have to worry about baggy lining or losing the tight snug of your mesh overtime or over use.
Tashtego 2.0 lasts - pockets and all.
To make sure your items stay snug in Tashtego’s pockets, we added a silicone bead backing that prevents your things from sliding out.
Small or large, your essentials will be tight and secure in Tashtego. No more slipping and sliding.

Our side zipper pockets lets you stash away smaller items and small liquid bottles - so they don’t spill everywhere. The zippers are made by YKK - the world’s leading zipper manufacturer - which means you’re in good hands.

Our top flap keeps all your essentials clean and keeps out water, dust, and any undesirables. But that’s not it. With Tashtego 2.0, we added additional pockets for your small stash items - such as nail clippers and chapstick.
Get even more from the same awesome design everyone loves!
Tashtego lays flat on its back - keeping your brushes and razors away from the bacterial cesspool called the countertop. Lay it down on any counter and easily find your essentials in a flash!
If there’s no place to lay your Tashtego, you can also hang it! Dual metal grommets lets you hang Tashtego practically anywhere.

Hang diagonally or levelled! We added an extra grommet so you can have your toiletries leveled and secure while hanging. Whether it’s a towel rack, shower curtain, or even a tree - you’ll have all your personal care tools at arms reach!
We replaced our old notched strap with a versatile G-hook that clips onto a daisy chain of webbing - letting you tighten and loosen your Tashtego as needed, with zero slack.

Wrap up your minimalist setup or roll up your entire countertop setup! Tashtego will accommodate all your needs and firmly close without extra space between the roll. Get full, secure closure - no matter what!

Though we created Tashtego for our hygiene tools, people have used it for much more than that. Whether it’s for camera gear, medical tools, everyday carries, lotion or as a knife roll - use Tashtego for whatever you need!
The durable material and compact design makes it ideal for any situation where you need your tools clean, separated, organized, and ready to go!
Tashtego is the ultimate travel toiletries kit. No more unsanitary messes or mixing of brushes - keep all your personal care essentials compact, ready to go and easy to find!
Hi, I’m Parker.
I like to make things. I make pens, knives, treehouses, drones and, now, anything else my kids want to make. But the biggest thing I’ve made is an airplane.

Yeah, the kind you get in and fly. I flew it all over our beautiful country - Death Valley, Maine, Florida, through the Bahamas and other places where the “airport” is really just a patch of crushed coral or a clearing carved out of the forest. These are places where there aren’t mechanics to work on airplanes, so taking tools along is a pretty good idea.

Airplanes can only lift a certain amount of weight and there isn’t much space, so you have to think carefully about what to take and how to pack it. Getting smacked in the face by a floating wrench really hurts.

That’s when I fell in love with tool rolls. Tool rolls can be small, barely larger than the tools themselves, the individual pockets keep everything organized and, since they’re made out of fabric, they don’t weigh much. It’s easy to see if you’re leaving a wrench buried in the grass. Mine didn’t have to be nice, so I usually made them myself.

So I launched the first version of Tashtego - the tool roll for your toiletries - on Kickstarter with huge success. 1,400 backers raised over $57,000 to make it a reality! I manufactured the products and shipped them around the world.

People liked the product, but 1400 backers had lots of ideas for improvement.   So I hired a professional design firm and, together 15 of our most diehard fans,  we improved all the things we loved and added new features to solve the problems of the 1.0.
Now, we’re ready to get the new, improved Tashtego to you and reinvent toiletry travel bags forever.
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 750+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $330MM raised between them.

title: GPD WIN 4 2025 : AMD APU handheld Console
description: AMD Ryzen™ AI 9 HX 370 / AMD Ryzen 7 8840U, 6' 1080P, 32GB RAM, 1TB~2TB SSD, USB4 / Oculink, 4G LTE
allParagraphs: AMD Ryzen™ AI 9 HX 370 / AMD Ryzen 7 8840U, 6' 1080P, 32GB RAM, 1TB~2TB SSD, USB4 / Oculink, 4G LTE
The world's smallest AMD APU handheld device
Exclusive performance optimization tool
Support SteamOS

The WIN 4 (2024) is equipped with an intelligent docking station that not only supports charging but also provides a plethora of interfaces on the back, including a docking station for expansion, allowing for easy charging, internet connectivity, external display, and more, all in one place.

3 × USB 3.2 Gen2 Type A, with speeds up to 10Gbps
1 × USB 3.2 Gen2 Type C, Charging only
1 × HDMI 2.0, interface supporting a 3840×2160 resolution and a refresh rate of 60Hz
1 × 10/100/1000Mbps, Adaptive RJ45 port

Exclusive Oculink port with direct PCIe connection, 63Gbps effective bandwidth, and support for GPD G1 graphics dock. Full-speed USB4 port with 40Gbps effective bandwidth, support for GPD G1 graphics dock and PD fast charging. Full-featured USB Type-C port with 10Gbps speed, support for intelligent docking station and PD fast charging. USB Type-A port with 10Gbps speed. A2 level microSD card reader with 160MB/s read and write speed.

With the ability to seamlessly play games and work on-the-go, the WIN 4 (2024) is a high-performance device that functions as both a console and a productivity tool, all while being portable and readily accessible. It can easily rival mainstream PCs in terms of performance.

So far, the WIN 4 is the smallest AMD APU handheld in the world, but its processor is powerful, far surpassing the custom APU of the Steam Deck. The WIN 4 inherits the sliding design and physical buttons of the WIN 3, and it supports Windows 10/11 and SteamOS (with system adaptation provided by Valve).

* The single-core and multi-core scores are benchmark data from Geekbench 6, which supports the AVX-512 instruction set. WIN 4 has AVX-512 enabled by default, so the benchmark reflects the performance ceiling of WIN 4.
* The integrated graphics score is Vulkan benchmark data from Geekbench 6.
* The Oculink (SFF-8612) port is a PCIe direct connection port that provides 63Gbps of effective bandwidth. It is mainly used to expand the GPD G1 graphics card dock, which meets the demand for improved real-time frame rates when connecting an external graphics card to the handheld device.
* AMD has supported the AVX-512 instruction set since the Ryzen 7000 series, which significantly enhances the CPU's single and double precision computing capabilities. The WIN 4 is the first to achieve 60 frames per second in playing major PS3 titles.
* The graphics card dock refers to an external graphics card expansion dock. WIN 4 not only supports desktop graphics card docks with replaceable graphics cards, but also supports the GPD G1 mobile graphics card dock. Due to the Oculink port directly connecting to PCIe with 63Gbps of effective bandwidth, it can unleash the maximum performance of the discrete graphics card.
* Dual OS refers to the support for SteamOS (system adaptation provided by Valve Corporation) in addition to Windows 10/11. However, WIN 4 is not limited to dual systems and can also support multiple systems. Some systems may lack driver support.

The design of the device’s ends draws inspiration from the rounded curves of the PSP, distributing pressure more evenly when held and conforming to ergonomic principles, resulting in a fully padded feel for greater comfort. The grip area features a protruding design with unique anti-slip textures, increasing the friction surface to prevent slipping. The body is still made from LG-DOW 121H aerospace-grade ABS synthetic resin, with a Rockwell hardness of 109R and a bending strength of 26,000 kg/cm². The matte spray finish gives it a deep black color, is glare-free, and has a rich texture.

WIN 4 (2025) features a 6-inch eye-care screen with native landscape mode and a 1920x1080 resolution, 16:9 golden ratio, and 368 PPI. It supports two refresh rates - 60Hz and 40Hz. The screen is protected by the 5th generation Corning Gorilla Glass and has DC dimming with no flicker. It inherits the slide cover design from WIN 3, but with a larger screen, narrower bezels, and a wider field of view.

Utilizing advanced 4nm manufacturing process, ZEN 5 + RDNA 3.5 + XDNA 2 architecture, experience cutting-edge artificial intelligence (AI) technology, accelerate multitasking, boost productivity, foster collaboration, and enhance efficiency.

The AVX-512 instruction set is designed for accelerating AI and HPC applications, as well as CPU-dependent simulation games, achieving a 1.3x improvement in FP32 floating-point inference multithreaded performance and a 2.5x improvement in INT8 integer inference multithreaded

To run emulators smoothly, a higher-performance CPU is needed. With the support of the AVX-512 instruction set, combined with the new RDNA 3.5 architecture integrated graphics, emulators such as RPCS3, Yuzu, Gitra, Vita3K, and Xenia can achieve up to a 50% performance boost.

AMD Radeon 890M integrated graphics, based on the all-new RDNA 3.5 architecture, integrates 16 CUs with 1024 sp, delivering a 33% improvement in specifications compared to the previous generation, resulting in a 36% increase in gaming performance! Combined with LPDDR5x 7500 MT/s memory, the graphics memory bandwidth has also been enhanced.

The brand-new AMD XDNA 2 architecture NPU is 3 times more powerful than the previous generation NPU, reaching 50 TOPS. Combined with the CPU and GPU, the total computing power is as high as 80 TOPS, far exceeding the 40 TOPS computing power standard of AI PCs. It improves computing efficiency and reduces overall power consumption, making local AI computing tasks such as AI matting faster and more efficient.

The GPD WIN Max 2 (2025) utilizes LPDDR5x 7500MT/s memory, available in three capacities: 32GB. Up to 16GB of this memory can be allocated to VRAM, allowing AI applications that require large VRAM to fully perform. While gaming, there's no need to worry about memory overflow, ensuring smooth gameplay.

The RDNA3 architecture integrated graphics AMD Radeon 780M has a power efficiency improvement of about 50%. Compared to FSR 2.0, FSR 3.0 has nearly doubled gaming performance, with the latest AAA games running at over 60 fps per second at a resolution of 1920×1200

The WIN 4 integrates an Oculink (SFF-8612) female port, providing PCIe direct connection with effective bandwidth of 63Gbps. It perfectly supports the GPD G1 mobile graphics dock, improving gaming experience and work efficiency.

It supports the PCIe Gen4×4 specification, with a theoretical maximum throughput of up to 7.877GB/s. The official configuration includes a 1TB or 2TB 2280 SSD (PCIe 4.0×4), with actual sequential read and write speeds exceeding 5000MB/s, allowing for unlimited expansion.

“MotionAssistant” is a tool specifically developed for the GPD handheld gaming device series, offering a variety of optimization tools such as TDP tuning in 1W increments, GPU lock frequency, predefined power consumption settings, shortcut keys for foreground switching, overlay on the gameplay screen, custom mapping of back buttons to shortcut keys, and the ability to change settings without calling up the motion assistant port. It provides a more refined experience than SteamOS. Additionally, the 'Power Control Panel' tool developed by overseas users allows for more intuitive adjustment of various parameters.

* "MotionAssistant" and "Power Control Panel" tools are developed by third-party enthusiasts and their copyrights belong to their original authors.
* With the agreement of the original authors, selected optimization tools will be integrated into the official firmware and made available for download on the GPD official website.

Playnite is an open-source game frontend that supports emulator games, and is fully compatible with the WIN 4. It offers multiple language interfaces and integrates 23 classic desktop themes for free switching.

Resources from game platforms such as Steam, Epic, and Uplay can be imported and managed through Playnite, which supports 14 mainstream game platform data sources and integrates with 28 game libraries, including support for emulator game libraries.

To enable gaming on-the-go, WIN 4 comes with an exclusive 4G LTE clip-on module that supports global network coverage. This module supports 4G TD-LTE, FDD-LTE, and 3G CDMA networks and accommodates a Nano-SIM card. It is an optional module and not included as standard equipment. There is no need to disassemble the device as it can be easily clipped onto the back of the device when needed.

During gaming, the top cover of the device is typically not slid open. However, there are times when you need to press the Esc key to return to the game settings interface, and sliding open the cover each time can be inconvenient. To address this, we have added two customizable physical buttons on the back of the WIN 4 to easily customize combination keys and interval times.

The L1/R1 trigger buttons of the WIN 4 come equipped with LED ambient lighting, featuring seven-color LED backlight effects with customizable colors and multiple lighting modes to choose from. You can also adjust or turn off the lighting effects at any time using the built-in WinControls tool within the system.

The most popular games among players are nothing but 'cars, guns, and balls.' Continuing the legacy of the WIN 3, WIN 4 features linear analog triggers with a 27-degree tilt angle, capable of producing 256 (0~255) state changes by converting the acquired acceleration value into digital commands. If you are a skilled driver, experiencing racing games on WIN 4 will result in a significant improvement in smoothness, with gradual acceleration and instant kills in shooting games, just like the real throttle and trigger of a firearm!

WIN 4 returns to the traditional staggered layout for its joysticks, highlighting the externally mounted dual 3D joysticks manufactured by ALPS. These joysticks have a large range of motion and low resistance, sacrificing some response speed for improved precision. When playing fighting games, the joystick's comfort level is comparable to top-tier Japanese Shimizu and Sanwa joysticks, with native support for L3/R3 functions via joystick pushes.

The WIN 4 has been upgraded to include dual vibration motors with adjustable levels of strong and weak vibration, enhancing the overall vibration experience. When playing shooting games, you can feel the recoil of your gun and the vibration of the entire device when starting the engine. The precise and intense vibration effects of WIN 4 provide an immersive gaming experience. If you prefer not to have vibration, you can also turn it off.

The WIN 4 features built-in 6-axis gyroscope positioning, which can convert motion-controlled actions into various joystick button inputs. Human movements can determine the direction of the racing car, providing a deep experience of motion control. This translates into a wider range of gameplay options. The exclusive optimization tool, 'MotionAssistant', not only emulates the Xbox 360 joystick but also simulates native motion-controlled games on the PS4.

WIN 4 returns to the traditional physical keyboard layout with a "QWERTY" full keyboard layout, utilizing metal dome technology for its keys. When the screen is slid open, the white backlight remains continuously lit and can be controlled via the keyboard to turn on or off.

Despite its small size, the WIN 4 never compromises on power consumption, with significant improvements in internal cooling. The cooling module features a larger turbo fan than the WIN 3, resulting in a 34% increase in airflow, a 22% increase in heat sink cross-section, and a 50% increase in dual heat pipe thickness, resulting in a 50% increase in thermal conductivity. Overall, the WIN 4's cooling efficiency has improved by 35% compared to the WIN 3.

In BIOS, the fan PWM control mode saves energy by only operating at 20% of its speed when the internal temperature is below 40°C. When the temperature exceeds 40°C, the fan accelerates with a 2% PWM increase each time, up to a maximum of 100%, combined with a high-speed air duct at the top to quickly expel heat from the machine. When tested, the WIN 4 is silent with an 18W TDP and quieter than the WIN 3 with a 28W TDP.

In terms of audio, the WIN 4 inherits its predecessor's excellent design, utilizing a high PSRR intelligent amplifier for improved efficiency and lower noise. It also retains the top-of-the-line German AAC stereo ultra-linear speakers, with a sound chamber that employs Bass materials, equivalent to a large 0.9cc sound chamber design. The dual-coil driven diaphragm ensures balanced force distribution, while double amplitude enhancement produces exceptionally loud sound!

To avoid frequent switching between the gamepad/mouse, the WIN 4 now features a Pocket 2-style Optical Finger Navigation mouse located in the lower right corner of the device, with support for click confirmation. This means that users can easily control the desktop even while in gamepad mode, making gaming and office tasks even more effortless and convenient.
To summarize:

1. The WIN 4 integrates three different input devices: "joystick-simulated mouse," "Optical Finger Navigation mouse," and "touch screen."
2. The WIN 4 supports four different input methods: "keyboard," "joystick-simulated mouse," "Optical Finger Navigation mouse," and "touch screen.

It can be frustrating to constantly enter your password every time the screen locks due to a temporary absence. With the WIN 4, the fingerprint unlock function is conveniently located in the lower left corner, allowing for one-touch system unlocking with a single finger.

Users criticized the single Type-C port on the WIN 3. The WIN 4 addresses this issue with a dual Type-C port design, featuring one USB4 and one full-featured Type-C port that support charging, video signal output, and data transmission.

* The GPD G1 graphics dock is recommended for use with the WIN 4 for better compatibility. If using a third-party graphics dock, it is recommended to use Nvidia RTX 10, 20, or 30 series graphics cards, and AMD Radeon RX 6XXX, 7XXX, and Intel ARC Axxx series graphics cards are currently not recommended.

Users criticized the single Type-C port on the WIN 3. The WIN 4 addresses this issue with a dual Type-C port design, featuring one USB4 and one full-featured Type-C port that support charging, video signal output, and data transmission.

Although the GPD WIN 3, which was previously crowdfunded on Indiegogo, received widespread acclaim, there were also many shortcomings, particularly with regards to Intel's graphics driver issues, which caused many games to crash or display graphics errors. In contrast, the stability of AMD's graphics has been widely recognized. To address these issues and provide gamers with a better gaming experience, the WIN 4 has chosen to adopt the AMD Ryzen 7 6800U processor. The latest version of WIN 4 has been upgraded to the AMD Ryzen 7 8840U and Ryzen 5 8640U processors, and an Oculink interface has been added, which supports the GPD G1 graphics dock, providing gamers with a better experience.

The primary reason for launching a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo is the high development, tooling, and material procurement costs for the WIN 4 (2024) version. All funds raised will be invested in the mass production of this product. We believe that this product will impress all players who love handheld gaming, and it will be the preferred choice for PC gaming handheld players for a long time to come. We hope that you can support this project. Let's work together for gaming!

We are a company specialized in handheld gaming devices and office equipment. We operate from Shenzhen, China under the brand name GPD (GamePad Digital), which came from the company founder's aspiration in making gaming products. GPD is committed to provide users with personalized products and services.

We want to thanks all the GPD followers and even more those who chosed to support us during the development process, as well as for the previous crowdfunding campaigns as it's your continuous support that has enabled us to continuously launch better products. We also want to thank everybody who will participate in our crowdfunding project for the first time as mass production and launch of this product would never be possible without your trust and support.
Thanks to our developpers, thanks to our community, thanks to our supporters.
A. Do the contributions listed for this project include tariffs incurred upon delivery to the users' home countries such as VAT?

The contributions listed in the project page include international express freight (including additional charges for delivery to remote areas) but do not cover tariffs incurred when entering the destination countries. Generally, the VAT rate for delivery of products to EU countries and Japan is 21% and 10%, respectively; in the case of the United States, tariff is required to be paid for products valued at more than $800; other countries may impose even higher tariff rates.
B. What after-sales services are available for those participating in the crowdfunding campaign?

Users participating in crowdfunding enjoy the same warranty benefits as the purchasers of officially launched products. Any user who is dissatisfied with the product can return it within one week of reception, but shipping cost for delivery of the product to the user will be deducted from the refund upon successful return.

Please note that postage and packaging costs incurred for the return should be borne by the user. When returning the product, please use local postal courier. If you use other international logistics services, the returned product will incur a tariff equivalent to 20% to 30% of its value when entering China, for which GPD won't be held responsible.
C. What if the crowdfunding target is not reached?

Even if the target amount is not reached, we will still send the products to those who have contributed to the project. At that time, we will find other financing channels to ensure the mass production of the final product. Players who love this product are advised to pay close attention to the latest updates on the project.
D. What if I didn't get answers to my question?
If you do not get a response on time, please contact us as follows:
During the crowdfunding process, please report technical issues by sending an email to: Kendyz@gpd.hk
After the crowdfunding is over, you can get updates on product delivery by sending an email to: Kendyz@gpd.hk
After receiving the product, you can report quality problems or ask for return by sending an email to: Kendyz@gpd.hk
For inquiries about distribution or marketing cooperation, please contact us by emailing: Sales03@gpd.hk
For crowdfunding participants, please make sure to contact us through the email address indicated in your supporter's note, and we will make sure to answer your questions.
For any other questions, do not hesitate to reach our unofficial Discord community server at the following adress, a lot of great people are over there: https://discord.gg/vJx62UR
We will ensure that delivery is made first to those who support us on Indiegogo.

Product specifications may change during the crowdfunding process for the purpose of making further improvements, in which case we will notify everyone as soon as possible on the "Update" section of our Indiegogo page.
We will make sure the product passes CE-RoHS, FCC, CCC, JATE, MIC and other international certifications.

We will try our best to make delivery at the agreed time. However, we might have to postpone delivery due to unpredictable supply chain problems or quality control issues, so please be patient if we do! Thank you for your understanding and support!

title: Packie Presents: PacMac Mobile!
description: Phones! Fixes! Friendliness! And fur… okay, maybe not fur.
allParagraphs: Phones! Fixes! Friendliness! And fur… okay, maybe not fur.
?? Packie Presents: PacMac Mobile!
Phones! Fixes! Friendliness! And fur… okay, maybe not fur.
? What Is PacMac Mobile?
Hey hey! I’m Packie, your friendly red panda mascot, and I’m here to tell you about my new favorite hangout: PacMac Mobile — the ultimate local spot for affordable phones and certified Apple repairs.

We're not some boring big-box store. Nope! We’re your neighborhood tech heroes, saving devices and budgets one cracked screen at a time. All from a cozy little storefront right here in the Hastings–Grand Island area. ??
?️ What We Do (besides being adorable)
At PacMac, we:
Sell sweet, budget-friendly smartphones ??
Hook you up with easy-to-understand wireless plans (no secret ninja fees) ??
Fix cracked screens, bad batteries, weird glitches, and more—fast! ⚡?
Use real-deal certified techs with a 90-day repair warranty ?‍??️
Basically, we make your phone happy again. And who doesn’t want a happy phone?
? Why We’re Different (and cool)
We’re a locally owned business, not some giant faceless tech blob ?
Our prices are honest, our service is fast, and our vibes are immaculate ✨
We actually care about people. Like, real human people. With names.
Did I mention we’re FUN? ‘Cause we’re fun. And fuzzy. And fun. ??
? Why We Need Your Help
Starting a business takes more than just dreams and snacks (though we have both). We’re raising $5,000 in 30 days to help us:
Buy tools, parts, and techy thingamajigs ??
Stock up on phones and accessories ??
Get certified (like, officially... not just from the Red Panda School of Cool) ?
Put up signs that say “WE FIX STUFF” but, y’know, nicely ?
Pay the boring adult bills like insurance and licensing ??
? Backer Rewards (Aww yeah!)
You get cool stuff for helping us out! We’re talkin’:
Stickers of yours truly (I’m the red panda, remember?)
Merch so fresh even your grandma will say, “That’s drippy”
Early bird discounts on repairs
VIP invites to our launch party ?
Maybe even a personalized thank-you video from moi ??
(Reward tiers coming next with pics—prepare for max cuteness.)
?️ Timeline (a.k.a. The Plan)
June 2025: Campaign goes live ?
July: We buy all the cool gear & start setup ?
August: Soft launch + some test fixes (no pandas were harmed) ?️
Fall: ? GRAND OPENING — and you’ll be a part of it!
❤️ Meet the Humans Behind the Panda

This dream belongs to Alex & Terra, two awesome humans with big hearts, tiny screwdrivers, and a love for helping folks stay connected. They’re working day and night (and occasionally cuddling me) to make this happen.
When you support us, you're not just backing a business. You're joining a community movement to bring honest tech service back home.
? How You Can Help
Back this campaign for panda-powered perks
Share this with your friends (and your enemies too, they need help probably)
Follow us online for updates, pics, and probably memes ?
Let’s do this, fam!
From screen cracks to fresh starts, PacMac Mobile is here to help—with pawsitive vibes, honest service, and a little bit of panda magic. ✨??
?️ Risks and Challenges

Launching a new tech and repair shop, even with years of experience and a solid plan, comes with a few real-world hurdles. While we’ve worked hard to prepare, here’s what could go sideways—and how we’re ready to face it:

? Supply Chain Delays:
We rely on third-party vendors for certified Apple parts, phones, and accessories. While we’ve built relationships with reliable suppliers, unexpected delays or inventory shortages can occasionally slow things down. If this happens, we’ll communicate openly and get things back on track ASAP.

? Shipping & Fulfillment:
For backer rewards (like merch or swag), there could be minor hiccups in printing, shipping, or timing. We've preselected vendors and built in buffer time to minimize delays, but if something takes longer than expected, we’ll keep you updated and make it right.

? Market Competition:
We know we’re going up against both corporate carriers and other independent repair shops. That’s why our secret sauce is personal, hyper-local service with a tech-savvy and genuinely caring team. We’re offering something the big players can’t: real repairs, human connection, and affordable tech access.

? Financial Pressure:
Lease-to-own plans and startup equipment costs can add up. This Kickstarter helps us reduce debt and start strong—but rest assured, we've budgeted carefully and have multiple revenue streams (repairs, Boost Mobile sales, accessories) to keep things sustainable.

? Packie May Accidentally Mail a Sticker to the Wrong Galaxy:
Look, Packie’s doing his best, but he's a red panda with zero logistics training. Still, we’re confident we’ll deliver your rewards—galaxy misroutes excluded.

Bottom Line:
We’re committed, certified, and ready. With your support, we’ll handle any bumps in the road with transparency, hustle, and a whole lot of gratitude.
Supporting entrepreneurs, creators and creative communities since 2008
Follow us!

title: Whistler Cartoon Jigsaw Puzzle Fundraiser 2.0
description: The next hilarious version of the ski puzzle that raised thousands for Whistler Community Services.
allParagraphs: The next hilarious version of the ski puzzle that raised thousands for Whistler Community Services.

I'm Lorne Craig, a BC skier, designer and cartoonist. In 2020 I successfully launched (and SOLD OUT) the first See You in Whistler cartoon jigsaw puzzle, with amazing backers raising thousands of dollars for the Whistler Community Services Society. Now we are doing it again, with more crazy drawings, more village fun and more wacky characters! And, like last time, we have some VERY special limited-edition perks to offer!
It's the perfect gift for Whistler fans and skiers, with hours of family fun in every box.

We are incredibly grateful to the followers who brought our first puzzle to fruition. Once again, backer funds will go to artwork, puzzle production, and of course, Whistler Community Services Society. Our goal is to print 500 puzzles, but if we can increase that quantity it means lower costs and more money for WCSS! In order for the artwork to retain its balance and character, we are limiting the number of custom draw-in spaces available, to a total of:
So get your perks secured early!

Whistler Community Services Society provides an amazing resource for people of all ages who find themselves in need in this expensive, transitory and sometimes unforgiving resort town. Services our fundraising will support include:

For our last See You in Whistler puzzle, I'm proud to say we delivered on every single puzzle and perk. Of course, 2020 was the year of supply-chain challenges, so our delivery date was pushed back. But we were grateful for the patience of our backers, and once puzzles were delivered, we got some great reviews from many satisfied puzzlers!

We will be using the same high-quality North American-based puzzle printing resource as we did with the 2020 puzzle, so our supply chain is well known. But any production project has its potential challenges - these can including puzzle shipping delays and border issues, Canada Post delays or strikes and further unknown supply-chain disruptions.

The See You in Whistler puzzle and our WCSS fundraising are a success only because of the incredible support of our BC fans, Whistler locals, and international regulars. Even if you can't back us for a puzzle or draw-in, sharing this campaign on your social networks can go a long way to making this crazy project a success for all.
Feel free to message me if you want an interview or any other images or materials to share.
Thanks for checking out the See You in Whistler Puzzle story!
Lorne Craig

title: JIREST:Smart Anti-Snoring Pillow with PVDF Sensors
description: PVDF Sensor | AI Sleep Tracking | Anti-Snoring | Neck Massage | App Control | Power Bank Ready
allParagraphs: PVDF Sensor | AI Sleep Tracking | Anti-Snoring | Neck Massage | App Control | Power Bank Ready

Do you often wake up feeling like you haven’t truly rested? Do you struggle with tossing and turning at night? Or wake up with a sore neck and lingering fatigue? If a full night’s sleep still leaves you feeling drained, something might be missing from your sleep routine.

Quality sleep depends on smooth breathing, supportive comfort, pleasant humidity and texture, and a quiet sleep partner of course. The right pillow can make a difference, and that’s where JIREST Pillow comes in. Designed to support better sleep, it helps you wake up refreshed and ready for the day.

Achieving quality sleep requires the right support, and JIREST Pillow is designed to enhance your rest from every angle. With intelligent snore regulation, neck massage therapy, and pressure-relieving memory foam, it helps you breathe better, relax deeper, and sleep more comfortably. The hyaluronic acid-infused pillowcase adds a touch of luxury, keeping your skin hydrated while you rest. JIREST combines innovation and comfort to ensure you wake up truly refreshed.
Thanks to JIREST's PVDF Sensor Technology, the pillow delivers high-precision, ultra-fast monitoring, ensuring your sleep receives millisecond-level attention.

JIREST tracks health trends like heart rate, breathing, and snoring with real-time precision, detecting sleep disruptions and optimizing rest. Its advanced technology ensures accurate insights for both current and future well-being while enhancing sleep quality.

The seamlessly built-in design ensures that JIREST remains purely a pillow—no bulk, no hassle, just effortless comfort. Blending cutting-edge technology with luxurious ergonomics, JIREST delivers an unparalleled sleep experience, where innovation meets ultimate relaxation.

Long-term exposure to snoring not only harms your own health but also affects your partner’s well-being, preventing both of you from fully recovering through sleep. That’s why a pillow that helps regulate snoring is essential. JIREST goes beyond simply stopping snoring in the moment—it gradually corrects your sleeping posture over time, helping to adjust your snoring at its root. With JIREST, both you and your partner can enjoy healthier, more restful sleep.

As you sleep, JIREST’s ultra-sensitive, high-precision sensors capture vital signs—heart rate, breathing patterns, and movements—transmitting this data to its AI-powered core. The AI chip instantly processes the information and commands the adaptive airbag system to gently adjust your head position, ensuring an open airway and preventing snoring.

When harmful deep snoring is detected, JIREST’s intelligent system activates its snore intervention mode, gently adjusting your head position to open the airway for effortless breathing. Results begin in just 20+ days, and within a few months, 80%+ of users experience noticeable snore reduction—or even complete relief.

More than just reactive, JIREST is intelligently proactive—automatically detecting when you’re in bed, seamlessly activating its monitoring mode, and optimizing sleep with pre-set smart functions for a truly effortless, tailored rest experience.
Connect via Bluetooth to quickly complete setup, and access a real-time monitoring interface displaying simulated vital signs, including heart rate, respiratory rate, and sleep status.

The sleep statistics dashboard continuously records and processes data whenever the pillow is in use, tracking heart rate and breathing patterns. This data is organized into daily, monthly, and yearly summaries. By analyzing individual sleep and snoring trends, the app designs a tailored, science-based plan to enhance sleep quality and promote healthier rest.

The JIREST Smart Pillow includes a built-in neck massage function to ease tension and enhance relaxation. With adjustable intensity levels, it delivers a calming massage to help you unwind and get ready for a peaceful night’s sleep.

JIREST Pillow is designed with ergonomic precision to provide optimal support for your head, neck, and shoulders. Its carefully contoured shape helps maintain natural spinal alignment, reducing pressure points and minimizing discomfort. The rebound memory foam adapts to your sleeping position, offering both softness and firm support for a balanced feel. Whether you sleep on your back, side, or stomach, JIREST ensures enhanced comfort and proper posture, promoting deeper, more restorative sleep.

The JIREST Smart Pillow is crafted with memory foam that conforms to the shape of your head and neck, offering exceptional comfort and relieving pressure. This advanced memory foam is highly breathable and absorbs moisture, efficiently dispersing body heat for a cool, comfortable sleep environment.

he JIREST Pillow’s ultra-fine polyester pillowcase provides a cool, refreshing feel with built-in anti-mite and antibacterial properties for a cleaner, healthier sleep. One side is infused with hyaluronic acid, offering gentle hydration to the face and helping to minimize sleep lines, ensuring a soothing and skin-friendly sleep experience.

JIREST is not just designed for easy portability with its built-in features, but also addresses your power needs. Its compatibility with power banks allows you to experience the comfort of the JIREST Smart Pillow even in places where electricity is limited. Whether you're traveling, camping, or on the go, you can rely on JIREST for a restful, uninterrupted sleep experience anytime, anywhere.

The JIREST team specializes in developing innovative personal health and beauty products, ranging from ultrasonic skin scrubbers, water oxygen injectors, and plasma acne removers to LED makeup mirrors, neck massage pillows, Bluetooth-enabled music pillows, back cushions, fascia massage guns, eye massagers, beauty wands, RF beauty devices, mini humidifiers, and more. Each product meets rigorous standards, holding FDA, FCC, CE, ROHS, KC, and PSE certifications. Our products are popular across Europe, North America, and Asia, including Germany, Italy, Sweden, Poland, Russia, Canada, Japan, Korea, and the Middle East, reaching over 20 countries worldwide.

title: Your Last Knife - The Last Knife You'll Ever Need.
description: An excellent blade isn't enough. We think the handle needs to be a unique work of art as well.
allParagraphs: An excellent blade isn't enough. We think the handle needs to be a unique work of art as well.
It all started pretty simply and honestly.

After much searching, I found a supplier who would sell me awesome knives without the handles. I bought six, and figured if I made them up and sold a few, I would get a free knife to use at work. So I did just that.
I posted them up on Facebook marketplace on a whim, and by the next day, I had received 70 messages asking for them.
I bought another 20 after that, and they were gone within two days, which is when I decided I could seriously do something special with these.
So why do I need Indiegogo?

I want to expand my range to a full set of knives with custom designed handles. The chef's knife has been a really well received product and I have had requests to expand on that range as one chef's knife wasn't enough.

Sadly large suppliers will only sell to me if I can get enough orders to justify their production runs. I managed to get a few production samples which I experimented with and I was very happy with the quality of the blade. I am excited by the opportunity to create unique handles in all shapes and sizes for every variety of knife.
With your help, I can order in Nakiri, Santoku, Utility, Boning and Bread knives. Then I can make up matching knife sets with unique handles that will make everybody jealous!
So what makes these knives so special?

I'm a chef, been at it for 18 years now, and I've gone through many knives. The biggest issue I had found was edge retention. You want your knives to stay sharp as long as possible, and after much research I found the magic metal - VG10.
It is a stainless steel with a high carbon content containing 1% Carbon, 15% Chromium, 1% Molybdenum, 0.2% Vanadium, 1.5% Cobalt, and 0.5% Manganese.
Basically, that means that it has all the properties of high carbon steels used in high end forged knives without the rusting and maintenance issues. The best of both worlds.
With your backing, these are what I plan extend my range to:
Now comes the fun part.
I think a knife handle should reflect the user and not be identically mass produced. What I love won't be what somebody else will love. And for something you want to show off, it needs to be awesome!
Choose your favourite, and add your customisation in the notes during checkout.
The chef's knives had been my trade, and I thought I should show off a few comments I found online of them.
Risks and challenges

I think the biggest challenge will be depending on how many orders I receive. Handles like the blue/yellow/black resin I can make an unlimited amount of. However, the raw timbers are limited to material availability. So if I receive 1000 orders for just Olive timber, I may need to write down out of stock on it.
I will also adjust the delivery date after a certain amount of orders come in, so I can keep within the promised delivery date.
Apart from that, I've got a system set up to make them, and have gotten a fair chunk of practice at it now, so I can pump out whatever handles you love!

title: TIMECRAFT: Build Your Own Wooden Mechanical Clock
description: Experience the Art of Classical wooden puzzles --Assemble, Personalize, and Rediscover Time.
allParagraphs: Experience the Art of Classical wooden puzzles --Assemble, Personalize, and Rediscover Time.
Traditional Tenon and Mortise Joinery

Step into the world of classical woodworking with time-honored wooden tenon and mortise joinery — no adhesive or nails required. This ancient technique, passed down through generations, ensures a secure and seamless fit. Each joint is crafted with precision, reflecting the wisdom and artistry of master woodworkers. It not only shows you the specific time, but also tells you the date which makes it so special and unique.
Engage Your Mind and Hands
Discover your inner builder with 106 intricately designed pieces. Assembling this clock is not just about creating a functional piece — it's a rewarding and meditative experience.
The imitation copper finish adds a refined, vintage charm to the clock. Its soft metallic sheen reflects light beautifully, elevating the overall design.
As time quietly ticks away, a soft, warm light glows from within the clock, adding a touch of warmth to your space. Perfect for work sessions or quiet evenings.
This clock is more than a timepiece — it's a piece of art. The exposed wooden gears and vintage metal finish make it a striking addition to any room.
Powered by a high-quality quartz movement, the clock offers accurate and silent timekeeping. No ticking — just smooth, reliable precision.
Make It Uniquely Yours
Why settle for off-the-shelf when you can create something personal? The clock includes a DIY option, allowing you to customize it with your favorite colors and designs.

Our team is passionate about blending tradition with innovation. We bring together a diverse group of designers, engineers, and production specialists who share a love for fine craftsmanship and creative design.

Our journey to bring TIMECRAFT to life began over a year ago. From initial concept to final production, every step has been carefully planned and executed to create a high-quality product that reflects both tradition and innovation. Here’s a detailed look at how TIMECRAFT came to life:

title: Rainbow Roll-up Shorts 2.0 AKA The Rudest Shorts
description: Launching new, revamped, improved and refreshed Rainbow Roll-up Shorts under the Rudest Brand.
allParagraphs: Launching new, revamped, improved and refreshed Rainbow Roll-up Shorts under the Rudest Brand.

Back in 2019 I came up with an original design of the Rainbow Roll-up Shorts. Now, I am launching my new, refreshed design inspired by the much-loved original, available only as a limited release through my Indiegogo campaign for The Rudest Brand.

The Rudest Brand is my new project inspired by the fashion of the 1980s and 1990s. I am hoping to fund it's further development by the contributions coming through this initial campaign and the Shorts sales once manufactured.
Front:
Back:
This is the amount we need to manufacture the new Rainbow Roll-up Shorts in 3 colors: Black, Grey and White.
Rudest Shorts in Black
Rudest Shorts in Grey
Rudest Shorts in White
Check out our fabric choice we already picked with our supplier: 240g/sqm, 98% cotton, 2% elastane (spandex):
The new design will see some of these fabulous features:

Over the years I have been overwhelmed by the support of dozens of thousands of you supporting brands and products I created. It's truly amazing to see how much you love the things I make! So yet again I can promise you:

All Perks of over $55 (2 pairs+) come with free shipping. If you pick a single pair, there is a shipping charge of $7. The Rudest Shorts come at a retail price of $50 per pair but by supporting The Rudest Brand Indiegogo campaign you are getting a stellar deal at $30 or less. Please note that the shipping prices are for supporters based in the USA, UK, EU, Australia, Canada and New Zealand. Want it shiped anywhere else? Please check the shipping price when checking out.
Here are the rewards I prepared for you:
Starter Deal: 1 Pair of Shorts at $30 + $7 shipping (you save $20):
Double Deal: 2 Pairs of Shorts at $55, free shipping (you save $45):

title: Moaan: Write More Naturally and Travel Lighter
description: A thinner 10.3" E-Ink Tablet is unique with a flexible, glass-free, and the lightest E-ink layer.
allParagraphs: A thinner 10.3" E-Ink Tablet is unique with a flexible, glass-free, and the lightest E-ink layer.
Moaan is a really good deal for an E-Ink Tablet with a big screen. It has a sleek white look and a fancy back cover. The exquisite details make it stand out among other ePaper tablets.

Moaan E-Ink Tablet introduces a 10.3” A4 size flexible glass-free E-ink screen for the first time. Compared to traditional glass screens, Moaan's flexible screen is more elastic and lightweight, giving you a writing experience that truly feels like real paper. Plus, its thinner and lighter body allows you to effortlessly take notes, read, and annotate anytime, anywhere!

The E-ink layer of Moaan adopts a flexible, bendable, glass-free layer design, weighing only 70g. Thanks to this design, we balance a 10.3” A4-sized screen with a lighter body than traditional glass screens.
When you write on the screen, the pen tip gets closer to the surface compared to a glass screen, making it feel like you're truly writing on paper!
Great for students, sketch artists, comic book fans, book lovers, etc.
It also features a flat PMMA cover and Anti-Glare (AG) film. Compared to similar products, it is more comfortable to write on, including surface friction when writing.
Measuring 6.5mm thin and 9.5inches long, it's light and small enough to carry with you anywhere!
10.3” flexible E-Ink screen meets 227ppi | 1872 x 1404 HD resolution. This excellent flexible screen is friendly to your eyes, letting you read, write, or draw whenever the mood strikes!

The Wacom® electromagnetic pen is like magic! When you press harder, your lines get bolder—just like using a regular pen on paper. It gives you awesome control for making cool drawings and writing, all in the digital world！
If the pen tip goes wrong, you don't have to replace the entire pen, you just need to replace the it, which saves money and is eco-friendly.
It's super handy and makes your life easier. Capture ideas on the fly by saving or taking annotations. Easily find your handwritten notes or typed texts to stay organized..
Plus, you can customize page layout and screen contrast to match your reading style. It's all about making reading enjoyable to you!

A perfect document viewer with full compatibility. With all common file formats including: pdf、epub、txt、doc、docx、wps、ppt、pptx、dps、xls、xlsx、csv、et、html、mht. (Additional formats can be accessed through third-party apps.)
Use your finger with capacitive touch for quick notes or sketching, or use the included Wacom stylus for writing, document mark-up, or detailed drawing
This E-Ink screen alleviates eye fatigue, allowing you to set aside concerns about electronic screens and fully immerse yourself in reading.

You've got 2GB of RAM to keep things running smoothly—no glitches or delays. And with 32GB of storage space, whether you're reading e-books, taking notes, or enjoying pictures, you've got room to spare for all your stuff.

WiFi connection for easy syncing of files, convenient viewing and editing; Backup your book notes, share thoughts and enjoy rich reading resources and sending emails, browsing the web, downloading e-books.etc.
Bluetooth pairing mode allows you to connect various devices, enhancing your reading experience. Support Bluetooth keyboard, earbuds, speaker, headphones, etc.

Moaan’s CPU is like a power-saving superhero—it switches between big and small cores and hardly sips any power when the screen isn't changing. Thanks to its special power-saving smarts, the battery lasts even longer.
The 3800mAh battery lets you read to your heart's content without constantly worrying about recharging.

Turning the E-Ink screen into a tablet is a breeze with full support for Google's Play framework, including the Google Play store. You can install almost any Android app. The Android system also plays nice with third-party apps, giving you more options for study, work, and entertainment.

In the realm of digital reading, Moaan has garnered acclaim and sales, attracting content partners to collaborate in providing readers with a healthy, focused, and efficient reading experience. Embracing diversity over exclusivity. Moaan is dedicated to offering a rich and varied selection. With a commitment to exceptional user experience, aesthetic appeal, and cost-effectiveness, Moaan strives to be the forefront carrier of the new era of reading!

title: 2RedWines Supporting Prostate Cancer Research-2023
description: Two Award-Winning Red Wines Supporting Prostate Cancer Research
allParagraphs: Two Award-Winning Red Wines Supporting Prostate Cancer Research

A long-time winelover, I (Winemaker Bob) started making award-winning small volume wines in 2007 as a hobby.  Diagnosed with prostate cancer at an incurable stage in 2009, the comfort of my world was shattered.  Determined to make the best of the situation, I created the Hollander Foundation, an IRS-approved 501c3 non-profit supporting prostate cancer research.

Then, I directed 100% of the proceeds from my wine-making efforts at  2redWinery into prostate cancer research. Thanks to your tax-deductible support, I will continue to produce great wines while supporting prostate cancer research.

This is as much fun as it looks
This Indiegogo campaign has two parts:
Available to you are the wines we drink and love at home.  Select from the items on the right.

2013 –Lance Pagliaro, M.D., Department of Oncology, Mayo Clinic
2014 – Nima Sharifi, M.D., Department of Cancer Biology, Cleveland Clinic
2015 – Padmanee Sharma, M.D., Department of Genitourinary Medical Oncology, MD Anderson
2016 – Scott Dehm, M.D. Department of Laboratory Medicine and Pathology, Mayo Clinic
2017 – Mary-Ellen Taplin, M.D. Department of Medicine, Harvard Medical School
2018 – Partnering with Fox Chase Cancer Center
2019 – Marc Smaldone, M.D.– Fox Chase Cancer Center
2020 – Eli M. Van Allen, M.D. – Dana Farber Cancer Institute
2021 – John K. Lee, M.D. – Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center
2022 - Partnering with Prostate Cancer Foundation
2021 Gift Recipient John K. Lee, M.D., of Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center on the impact of gifts like those from the Foundation:

I've Been Podcasted!
NPR on Florida WUFT - Tell Me More
Wine Talks with Paul K. 
Interview with the Prostate Cancer Foundation
Wines to Find with Michelle and Sandy

title: BeMe  Your AI Twin for Life’s Demands
description: BeMe is your digital twin that handles the noise so you can focus on living. Only 100 Beta Places
allParagraphs: BeMe is your digital twin that handles the noise so you can focus on living. Only 100 Beta Places

Short Summary:
Tired of the digital chaos and noise? I’m Dougie Toal, founder of BeMe. After 20 years of working for global tech businesses, I’m creating BeMe: the world’s first AI Twin. Your AI Twin learns how you work and communicates just like you, handling calls, messages, and scheduling while you focus on what matters. With your help, we’ll bring this revolutionary AI technology to life and give people back time, peace of mind, and control.

What We Need & What You Get:We’re aiming to raise £50,000 to turbo charge development, expand functionality, and deliver more powerful tools sooner. Early adopters get first access to BeMe and become part of shaping the future of AI Twins, plus exclusive discounts and updates.

The Impact:
Your support helps us create a world where people no longer need to juggle endless admin, calls, and messages. BeMe will change how we work, giving back time and freedom to thousands.

Risks & Challenges:
Building truly adaptive AI is complex. But with decades of experience leading tech projects, we’re ready. We’re committed to transparency and will share updates as we progress.

Other Ways You Can Help:
If you can’t contribute, help spread the word. Share our campaign with friends and on social media. Every bit helps!
Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that's all there is to it.

title: Lumita Co: Elevating beauty and wellness
description: Advanced peptide based solutions for healthier skin, stronger bodies,and radiant confidence
allParagraphs: Advanced peptide based solutions for healthier skin, stronger bodies,and radiant confidence

Hi, I’m Linda Vasquez,  the founder of Lumita Co., a wellness and skincare company built on the power of advanced peptides. I started Lumita to provide high-performance, science-backed solutions for both men and women who want to feel and look their best—naturally.

This campaign is your chance to be part of something meaningful: helping people restore confidence and vitality through products designed to work from the inside out. With your support, Lumita Co. can officially launch our signature product line and help people embrace their full wellness potential.

We’re raising $2,000 to complete product development, packaging, and our first manufacturing run. Your contribution will fund:Production of our first two peptide-powered products,FDA-registered lab testing and safety certifications, as well as sustainable packaging and wellness-forward branding.Your name or brand featured on our Founding Supporters Wall as a token of gratitude. If we don’t reach our full goal, your contributions will still go toward bringing Lumita to life we’ll scale appropriately and continue pushing forward with your help.

People are tired of complicated routines and products that overpromise and underdeliver. Lumita Co. is different. We’re science-first, honest, and inclusive.By supporting this campaign, you’ll help launch a brand that: Fills the gap in premium, peptide based skincare and wellness.Offers effective, minimal ingredient solutions for all genders, builds a trusted community focused on long-term well-being, and you’re not just funding products you’re fueling a movement.

We’ve done the research and secured reliable partnerships with labs and manufacturers. That said, there may be delays in production, ingredient sourcing, or packaging due to supply chain fluctuations. We’re committed to transparency and will keep you updated every step of the way.

We understand that not everyone can contribute financially and that’s okay! There are still powerful ways you can support Lumita Co.:
Share this campaign with your friends, family, and wellness-loving community. A simple post on social media can go a long way! Use Indiegogo’s share tools to spread the word with just a few clicks. Tag us on Instagram or TikTok if you talk about peptides, skincare, or health—we’ll reshare you and keep the buzz going.Tell someone you know who could benefit from premium, science-backed skincare and wellness products.

Your voice matters, and every share helps us get closer to our launch. I thank you in advance! 
Sincerely,
Linda Vasquez
Founder of Lumita Co.

Whether for scientific pursuit or pure curiosity, each discovery through a microscopic lens reveals the complex details of life, showing us how even the smallest structures can deepen our understanding of the world.
This is one of the key ways we come to understand our surroundings, but few truly master it.

Recognizing the intricate process of exploring the microscopic realm. Beaverlab is dedicated to simplifying this by integrating the basic steps of microscopy into one seamless solution, making it more accessible for everyone learning, education, research, industrial inspection, and personal exploration.

title: Super Portable Towel 2.0: Towel that Hugs You Back
description: Finally A Quick Drying Towel That Feels Good To Use.
allParagraphs: Finally A Quick Drying Towel That Feels Good To Use.
Gone are the days of carrying bulky towels!
And, gone are the days of NO-WIPE-JUST-PAT  Quick Drying Towels that feel unnatural to the skin.
Travoost Super Portable Towel 2.0 is a whole new category of towel which is pocket-sized, quick-drying and skin-friendly.
I was already facing problems with my cotton towel when I decided to take the much popular Quick Drying Travel Towel along with me.

I took the towel to the beaches of Spain, to the water and wine festivals, La Tomatina festival and the parties at Ibiza. However, the experience at a campsite near Valencia was something truly challenging.
So what if they feel UNNATURAL and UNCOMFORTABLE to the skin?
Or, have a SUEDE, RUBBERY feel?
Or, SCRATCHY AND IRRITATING?
Many first-time users complain that these towels just slip too much on the wet skin and take longer to dry the body.
What is the point of a towel that doesn’t feel comfortable?
Super Portable Towel 1.0 was designed after hours of research, many deliberations and discussions with manufacturers, endless material testing, and a lot of trial and error.

The towel experience in Spain kept bringing the team back to the core issues we were trying to solve. And, the result was a towel that’s way more efficient, comfortable and durable than anything currently existing in the market.

While we thought of going the crowdfunding road with SPT 1.0, we didn’t want to rush with a product that’s even one step away from perfect. We wanted to present a product that had been already tested on-ground.
Our towels were tried and tested by different travellers in various outdoor locations.
Some of them thought the size of the towel needed to be BIGGER
Some wanted a THICKER towel
And, others needed more COLOR OPTIONS
We humbly accepted the feedback and incorporated it in our towel.
We call it, Super Portable Towel 2.0

No More Smelly Towels  - Silver prevents the growth of odor-causing bacteria and fungi at the source, permanently. The longer a towel stays wet the more vulnerable it becomes to that musty  smell (which means bacteria).

title: Gamers First. Lightweight Hoodie by JAY23
description: All in 1: Water Resistant Heated Hoodie | Backpack | Face Mask | Hidden Travel Pockets | Waist-sack
allParagraphs: All in 1: Water Resistant Heated Hoodie | Backpack | Face Mask | Hidden Travel Pockets | Waist-sack
Who has never suffered from having to text with their hands frozen? Two heating pockets with dynamic power adjustment keep you warm in any condition. So slide your hands inside and warm yourself up!

And what if the opposite happens? It’s getting too hot for a hoodie and you’re not very enthusiastic about dragging it in your hands for the rest of the day.  Not a problem! Just convert your hoodie into a backpack within seconds, and keep your hands free while gaining some additional storage.

If you’re a cyclist, or you just happen to get on your bike from time to time, you probably know the struggle of accessing your pockets. We bet you will appreciate a safe pocket for your valuables with easy access to the phone, whenever needed.

The cities grow and grow, and public places can be crowded and overwhelming. Sometimes, you really need your space to calm down and focus. Here is your way to isolate yourself from whatever is happening around you: a blackout hood!
A special pocket that protects your personal data from being stolen by an RFID reader.
Designed for pandemic times: a neck gaiter, velcro-fastened to the hoodie, so you never lack a face cover when outside. Stay safe and healthy!

16 pockets, thumb holes, air vents, a KeyChain, holes for headphone cables, built-in microfiber cloth for smartphones or glasses, and even more hidden goodies that you will appreciate in time of need.

Our pieces are created 100% within the European Union, subject to the highest production standards and all the recycling-related requirements. We use breathable fabrics and nanotechnology textile finishing. Hoodies are made of 90% cotton and 10% polyester and brushed inside for extra softness. We draw abundantly from sportswear solutions when it comes to practicality, lightness, and comfort.

In short, you could call us a group of functional fashion freaks, excited and inspired by the gaming subculture, as well as technological advancements. We love geek culture and premium clothing with a streetwear twist.

Among us, you'll find: an entrepreneur who founded quite a few global brands, such as ALLPlayer or Woolet, a creator and manager of fashion brands amassed under the HubStyle umbrella, and a designer who gained exp points while working with biggest sportswear companies.

We were brought together by our love for functionality, minimalism, and tech innovations. We are fascinated by the changes happening around the world and we believe that fashion needs to follow – to answer new problems and needs. How it looks should be as important as how it works!

Well, it's not the first time we introduce a new product to the market via Kickstarter. We are experienced entrepreneurs who created dozens of successful brands. Fashion retail has been our everyday reality for 20 years, so we know very well how to execute and deliver. The Jay23 brand already exists, and it has all the infrastructure necessary to work.

And so, under usual circumstances, there would be close to zero potential risks here. However, the pandemic has changed how the world works and operates. The whole production process takes place locally and with the use of locally sourced materials, so, thankfully, we shouldn't encounter any delays, caused by e.g. closed borders, before shipment starts. But potential shipment issues could appear if the pandemic forces specific transit regulations between countries.

Also, regardless of the pandemic, bank holidays or customs in your country could delay your receiving of the product. In any case, we promise to keep you informed. Our policy here is full transparency.
