title: JARVISH: The Smartest Motorcycle Helmet Ever Made
description: Head-up display, 360° front & rear cameras & handsfree control
allParagraphs: Head-up display, 360° front & rear cameras & handsfree control
Packed with safety-enhancing features, JARVISH leads the way with distraction-free voice activation for motorcyclists to maintain maximum awareness and focus on the road.
It's the all-in-one smart riding solution you've been searching for.
Interview with Digital Trends

The X-Series’ full-face fit is comfortable and its stylish all-in-one design includes top of the range built-in HD surrounding sound speakers, noise reduction microphone, and front 2K camera as standard. The X-AR also includes the HUD, AR projections, 2K rear-facing camera and optical waveguide technology.
Our optional Tron design with LED strip lights gives riders the opportunity to truly stand out from the crowd.
If you are an enthusiastic and creative rider, we have good news for you!
Cooperating with a notable one-hundred-year-old brand, LAZER Helmets, we are releasing the JARVISH X painted version: ANGELO X
Designed by LAZER's chief designer and painted as a Samurai on fire, Angelo X is like a tiger on the road which is fierce and captivating, and brings you speed and individuality!

The X-AR model leverages optical waveguide technology on the HUD for riders who prefer visual instructions. The technology behind this ensures that even in bright light, these projections are visible. The HUD can be controlled and retracted easily via voice command.
The X-AR helmet has the ability to display directions, to notify the wearer of traffic and weather conditions, indicators, speed, hazard road signs and incoming caller IDs on the HUD.

Both the top of the range X-AR and standard X model come with 2K built-in front camera as standard. The X-AR model also houses a 2K rear-facing camera which can be activated on demand by voice so the rider has 360° visibility while on the road.

Journeys can be recorded in FHD video via the built-in front 2K camera and stored on an up to 256GB removable memory card in the helmet. The video can also be broadcasted in real-time to a rider's social media account by voice command.

Never miss a turn with integrated navigation set via the JARVISH app. Users input a destination address by voice to receive in-helmet audio directions and, with the JARVISH X-AR, also on the head-up display.

The new JARVISH X-Series connects with voice services such as Apple’s Siri or OK Google. Both the X-AR and X helmets are voice-activation only (no tap-to-talk), allowing riders to control the cameras, make a call, adjust the volume, play music and more, while keeping their focus on the road.

Automated sensors turns the helmet on when you wear it and turns the helmet off when it’s taken off. Gyro, e-compass, accelerometer and ambient light sensors analyze weather & road conditions to provide real-time alerts.

JARVISH X-series smart helmets also feature an individual audio processor for active noise cancellation and high-resolution sound regeneration quality. Our proprietary noise cancellation technology reduces wind noise and enhances the human voice to get clear call quality even up to 100 kph / 60 mph.
At only 3.08lbs/1.4kgs (X) and 3.75lbs/1.7kgs (X-AR), the pure carbon fiber helmet provides ultimate protection with extreme comfort.

Both the X-AR and standard X model are fully certified, including ECE R22.05 (Europe, Australia), DOT (US and Canada), CNS 2396, CNS 13438, CNS 13439 (Asia), FCC (electronic radiation safety certifications).

FLCB not only breaks the battery normal outlook but also the production process of traditional LPB. With ultra-thin and flexible features, FLCB could open endless possibilities. It can give JARVISH more design freedom to deliver a Smart Helmet.

Another amazing feature of FLCB is the safety. A FLCB cell in use keeps working even through is cut into pieces and stabbed with a pair of scissors. Experiments confirmed that FLCB is intrinsically safe and still workable even after folding, hitting, penetrating, cutting, or burning.
Experienced riders know any helmet is only as comfortable (and safe!) as how well the helmet fits. Building on our decades of riding experience we sweated the details to get the fitting just right.
Do not rely on sizing from another helmet manufacturer when pre-ordering your JARVISH Smart Helmet. No two helmets fit alike.

To find your fit, start by measuring your head with a flexible tape measure. The measuring tape should be held just above your eyebrows, the helmet will fit snuggly in the same area as a “baseball cap.”  See the sizing chart below.

JARVISH was founded in 2014 by the previous Advance Technology Division (ATD) team of Foxconn with the vision to bring superior design, high-quality accessible head-mounted products to consumers around the world. After two years of research the company launched the first smart helmet in the market in 2017.
We're on a mission to make your motorcycle as smart as you.

JARVISH specializes in the integration of software and hardware for motorcycle helmets. LAZER HELMETS, a world-renowned helmet supplier, highly recognizes the potential of JARVISH. Alexander de Vos van Steenwijk, Chairman of LAZER HELMETS, reckons the smart wearable device is the future. That’s why JARVISH and LAZER partnered to develop the first smart helmet, Monaco Evo S, to provide riders the safest riding experience. From that, JARVISH further improved the function of Monaco Evo S as generation II and re-named it as Monaco Evo S2.

In the meantime, the police force in Taiwan has cracked multiple fraud cases while wearing JARVISH Smart Helmets. The helmets, outfitted with new tech, allowed policemen to quietly gather evidence in numerous situations.
We’ve spent countless hours designing and building the newest form of smart wearable AR that will upgrade any motorcycle ride.

The purpose of the campaign is to be able to recruit more engineers to make the HUD fully integrated into the main board system, and create AR applications for the JARVISH smart helmet ecosystem. To do this, we need $50,000.
As a Kickstarter exclusive, we’re offering up to a 27% discount to make sure we reach our goal. This is a limited offer only available during our campaign.

Running a crowdfunding campaign requires a 100% transparent approach to our backers. We’ll do everything we can to keep you fully informed about the campaign, production, and shipping. If you ever have any questions or comments at all, just post them in the “Comments” section of our page and we’ll be sure to get back to you.
Where we ship?

We ship worldwide. UK and US (all 50 states + DC) will be offered Free Shipping. For the rest of the world shipping is $100. Worldwide shipping fees exclude GST, VAT, equivalent taxes and customs duties. GST and VAT, if any, will be collected from backers at the time of delivery.
When we start shipping?
Orders placed now for JARVISH X will begin shipping in October 2019. Orders placed now for JARVISH X-AR will begin shipping in September 2019.
Why order now?
By backing now you’ll be the among the first to experience the distraction-free riding that JARVISH smart helmet offers.
Like what you're seeing? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
We can't do this without you.

title: Castus: The Ultimate Air Purifier & Humidifier
description: All in one solution for purifying, sanitizing, humidifying indoor air & monitoring your air quality!
allParagraphs: All in one solution for purifying, sanitizing, humidifying indoor air & monitoring your air quality!

Researching air purification since 2012, we have engineered Castus to purify, sanitize and humidify your indoor air to a whole new level. Castus combines 7 technologies into a single system to capture, remove, and eliminate airborne pollutants and microorganisms. Also, it controls the humidity level in your home with nature-inspired microcapillary technology.
How can you get Castus? Just check the following guide or send an email to:
info@castustec.com
Castus Could be controlled via the implemented touch screen, remote control, or any smart iOS & Android device.
7 cutting edge air purification technologies with integrated humidity control make Castus the Ultimate Air Purifier, Sanitizer & Humidifier.
Castus portable Air Quality Monitor is equipped with 8 high-precision air pollution sensors to measure, analyze and monitor your air quality with implemented AI algorithms.
Castus Air Quality monitor  detects and monitors PM 1.0, 2.5, 10, Formaldehyde, Total Volatile Organic Compounds (TVOC), Carbon dioxide, Humidity, and Temperature.
With implemented Smart Wi-Fi, you can monitor your indoor air quality live or check history diagrams for each day Castus purification performance on Castus Air quality monitor or your smartphone:
Castus humidifies the air via a nature-inspired micro-capillary evaporation technology, making the air comfortable to breathe as well as clean.

Castus is equipped with the medical-grade HEPA 13 filter which removes the airborne pollutants bigger than 0.21 microns with 99.95% efficiency. For the comparison of the accuracy  of HEPA 13, Just check out how small is 0.21 micrometer:
Ozone-free, UVC technology will destroy hazardous microorganisms while keeping the air healthy for humans and pets.

Cooking, painting, or just new furniture could release harmful chemicals into your indoor air. Castus Nano-crystal-activated carbon filter will absorb and remove formaldehyde, volatile organic compounds, and odors from the air.
With a patented Nano-photocatalyst, Castus neutralizes harmful gases such as formaldehyde and phenol to neutral molecules.
Revolutionizing air purification for 9 years, Castus for the first time, implemented Nano-copper and Nano-silver filters to disable and neutralize microorganisms from indoor air.

Not only does Castus purify the air with a CADR of  287 cfm (488 m3/hr.), but also it releases 10 million anions per cubic centimeter to capture and eliminate air pollutants in the indoor air even without entering the air purifier in a passive mode.

Brushless- the ultra-quiet, 8-speed motor will provide 20 years of maintenance-free continuous performance with the lowest electricity consumption compared to regular motors of the air purifiers in the market.
Castus automatic sleep mode will make it surprisingly silent and will turn off its LEDs to be sure you can enjoy a deep sleep while breathing the purified air!
Featuring a CADR of  287 cfm (488 m3/hr.), it can purify a room of 320 sqft (30m2) in less than 10 minutes! It will be an ideal air purifier for spaces up to 1200 sqft (110 m2).

Castus is equipped with 4 safety measures to prevent any damage to children, pets, and adults. Child lock, Tilt Protection, Cover Sensor & Water level indicator will guarantee the safe operation of Castus in your home.

Castus portable air quality monitor will detect PM 1, 2.5, and 10 through laser sensors, CO2 with infrared technology, formaldehyde, TVOC, temperature, and humidity with semiconductor sensors, displaying all information on a 4.3” high-quality LCD after analysis with the implemented AI algorithms.

The smart WiFi system in Castus air purifier and air quality monitor enables you to control and monitor your indoor air quality with any iOS or Android device from anywhere in the world. Our Castus also listens to Alexa and Google assistant!
All functions are integrated into iOS, Android apps:
In 2021, Castus has been featured in multiple international, local newspapers and news sites. Please click on the photo of the journals for the complete version of the article.
And many more, such as:
Please contact us by sending an email to:
Press contact: hello@castustec.com
Customer service: info@castustec.com
Collaboration: sales@castustec.com
If you have to need any help regarding the purchasing process or selection of the right model according to your needs, please contact us at:
support@castustec.com
For technical-related questions, please send your request to:
tech@castustec.com
Let’s see what Castus does compare to the best brands in the market:
Castus comes in 3 models, Standard, Ultra & Ultimate. Each model is designed based on air purification requirements in indoor areas.
Each Castus air purifier model comes with its set of filters. You can add an Extra filter set with a 40% exclusive IGG discount, after selecting your air purifier model from the perks section.

Please note that the Nano-photocatalyst and  Nano-crystal activated carbon filters are merged as well as HEPA 13, Anti-bacterial Nano copper (in Ultra and Ultimate) and Anti-viral Nanosilver (in Ultimate) filters. We have merged filters to reduce the packaging material and shipment volumes to further reduce Castus products environmental footprint.
We kindly request from our supporters to recycle the packaging material as much as possible. We appreciate your collaboration.

Here is the list of all perks offered in this campaign. Please keep in mind that all the perks are not available together at the same time. Depending on the timeline of the campaign and perks claimed quantities,  some of them will be available to be selected.

To say thanks to everyone who contributes and boosts this campaign by spreading the word, we are offering some exclusive rewards, including a Free filter set, Air quality Monitor & Free Castus Standard Air Purifier.
To participate in the Castus Referral program, please click the buttons below and spread the word:
For checking your referral results, follow the steps below:
For more information, please refer to the following link:
How to Participate in a Referral Contest
Terms & Conditions of Referral program:
Use the following link to boost our campaign and earn 20% cashback:
https://castus-team.kickbooster.me/boost#
9 Years of Development, Research, and Experiments in One Glance:
Castus was a Dream in 2012, Now it is The Ultimate Air Purifier, Sanitizer & Humidifier ever built for residential use:
Take a deep breath!

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture and distribute Castus on a large scale. Our goal through this campaign is $10000, which will cover all of the costs that we are facing. Because of increased health regulations applying to air purifiers, we know that there will be additional hurdles in the near future. To prepare for those, we would like to raise an amount higher than our goal if possible, avoiding any unnecessary delays once the campaign ends.
Contribute now and help us to bring Castus to life by joining the Castus family:

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Castus by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware that Castus has arrived and that there is a new way to purify the air, the smoother this launch will go for us. Go ahead and tell all of your friends and family. Let them know what Castus can do for them. We appreciate all your support, monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.
We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:
MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on-site during production.

FULFILLMENT: We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.
Due to the difference in shipping, taxes, and customs duties for the destination countries, we just set the estimated shipping cost for the air purifier and air quality monitor.

We have collaboration with Indiegogo  partner, Easy ship fulfillment service, for managing Castus campaign perks shipments. Easy ship will collect the calculated additional fee regarding taxes, shipping, and duties in the time of shipping perks.  If you have any questions regarding the taxes, shipping and duties,  please contact us at logistics@castustec.com.

title: Insta Wi -HD Camera, Inkless Printer & Label Maker
description: Snap, Record, Print & Label anything for home, work, study, leisure & travel. For kids and family.
allParagraphs: Snap, Record, Print & Label anything for home, work, study, leisure & travel. For kids and family.
myFirst Camera Insta Wi, the only All-in-One Camera and Portable Label Printer that your kid needs. Last year, we brought you the 2nd version of our instant camera series - myFirst Camera Insta 2.

Now, we are back with even better features! Enjoy wireless photo transfers, a dedicated mobile application for label editing/creation, print different sizes of labels, and lastly, a cradle is provided to rest your little cute device!

At only 232 grams (0.51 lbs), it is portable, lightweight, and compact. Together with the dedicated myFirst Insta Wi mobile application, this camera does it all -  record, snap, print and tag everything for the home, school and office!
A family of myFirst Camera Insta, Insta 2, and Insta Wi

With more than 50 media reviews around the world, from global media outlets to tech-savvy YouTubers, and our favourite: regular moms and dads, more than 10,000 units of myFirst Camera Insta 2 were sold during our initial launch!

myFirst Camera Insta Wi comes with a brand new feature that allows you to create and print labels in different sizes. You can now label your files, documents, meal boxes, stationery, and more, no matter if you are in the office, school, or at home.
Color Sticker Labels
Choose your favourite color to label your jam or cookie jars.
Label your cookie jar
Petite Size Label
No more messy and missing tools.
Label your toolbox
Label Your Belonging With Your Selfie
We are pretty sure no one will take it by mistake.
Label your stationery with your photo

A dedicated app for myFirst Camera Insta Wi. You can download the mobile application in both Google Play and App Store. With the Insta Wi app, you can customize the label and send it wirelessly to the camera for printing.

No idea how to start off to create a nice and pretty label? There are label template which are suitable for different uses (kids closet, kitchen, school, scrapbook etc.) and in total more than 160+ preset templates for you to choose from.

Be creative! With various template of patterns, symbols, and icons, create your own special labels that suit your fancy. You can also adjust the size of icons, enter text, change the font type, add on border styles and much much more.

Transferring photos manually from memory cards to other devices is a tedious process. Now, you can connect your phone to the Insta Wi via Wi-Fi and transfer your photos wirelessly. No more hassles transmitting data from one device to another.

Many of you have asked, can we still print in color? Absolutely yes. All photos taken will be stored in the included memory card. Just transfer the photos to your mobile or connect the camera to your laptop via the included cable, and you can print your photos in color with any color printer.
Every household should own an Insta Wi. This gave us the idea to specially create a cradle to house the Insta Wi. It looks great on your desk too!

With the customized power on and off button and WiFi button on the cradle, without picking up the device, you can turn on the device and start using it for label printing in just a few seconds. How convenient!

An instant camera with both front and selfie lenses. Kids can enjoy taking photos, selfies and even groupfies anytime and anywhere they want! Just with a simple button press, easily switch between the front lens and the selfie lens.
Rear lens
Wide angle selfie lens

Great opportunity for your kids to unleash photography and videography skills. With the 12MP front & selfie cameras, it can take photos from 3MP all the way up to 12MP and also 1920×1080 videos as well. It's time to give your mobile phone (and camera) a rest.

With filters and frames pre-installed in the camera, kids can snap and print cute and interesting photos or stickers to create photo albums, name tags, scrapbooks etc. Watch your kids create their own masterpiece.

You're right, just 10 seconds! See the excitement on your kid's face when they get printouts in 10 seconds of what they have captured. Using thermal fast print technology, photos will be printed in black and white at the quickest speed.
What is Thermal Printing?
What is Thermal Printing

With inkless thermal printing, the ink never runs out. This is definitely a more cost effective solution for kids. They can print as many as they want without breaking the bank. Print up to 60 sheets per roll at only 1 cent per print!
Sometimes, it's hard for kids to control a device when buttons are small and not intuitive. Insta Wi comes with easy extra large buttons designed for kids and their cute little fingers!

Say goodbye to those bulky cameras or portable printers that you just use once and keep it in the cupboard forever. myFirst Insta Wi only weighs 232 grams (0.51 lbs). It's the smallest and lightest 4-in-1 camera & printer.
Let's compare the conventional label printer/thermal printing devices in the market.

Insta Wi is much smaller in size compared to other label printers, but we are able to do more. With 57mm (2.24 inches) wide labels, you can customize the font size as big you wish or you could also choose different sizes of label and print with smaller font sizes.
Think big, print big

Many other label printer models require an external power supply or battery while Insta Wi comes with a built-in rechargeable battery with a battery capacity of 1500mAh. With a full charge, kids can enjoy taking photos/videos for up to 5 hours.
Built-in battery
Insta Wi, Adjustable Neck Lanyard, Cradle, User Guide, 2 Sheets of Decorative Stickers, 5 Rolls of Paper/Stickers, Micro USB Cable, microSD Card Adapter, 16GB microSD Card
Thermal paper and stickers in the box:

With Insta Wi, we have specially designed a few sizes of label stickers. Now, you can have different label sizes option and print up to 4 different stickers in a row. These labels can be purchased as an add-on item at an affordable price.

Your kids' safety is always myFirst's top concern. We choose better quality and BPA-free thermal paper. We also provide thermal stickers which have different finishing, such as thermal sticker with patterns, colored sticker,  and also transparent stickers. (To be released at a later date)
Waterproof stickers
And also works with colored thermal papers

Designed for kids, myFirst is an EduTech proven progressive ensemble of first digital experiences to build their Tech IQ. The kids are the product managers where functionality is tailored to become the digital catalyst to a child’s natural cognitive processes, so learning naturally occurs through having fun. Join our community where children can grow up with technology safely introduced in their lives as the digital building blocks for big and creative minds!

We launched the previous version, myFirst Camera Insta 2, last year and received tremendous support from the media and fans. Check out one of the reviews here. (Photo taken with myFirst Camera Insta 2)

title: BodyCoat: Body-Warming Lotion with Toasty Tech
description: The first warming lotion to blow up on TikTok—keeps you warm in cold rooms, chilly weather & travel
allParagraphs: The first warming lotion to blow up on TikTok—keeps you warm in cold rooms, chilly weather & travel

flipd is an emerging beauty & lifestyle brand founded in San Francisco (2025) by two female friends. One, a beauty aficionado with creative prowess, the other a beauty insider with years of experience in the industry. Both, obsessed with innovation and creativity.
One night over drinks in our chilly hometown, we dreamed up something wild: a body lotion that could warm you up...
Sounds flipd, right?
That’s how BodyCoat was born. Our warming skin lotion that’s heating up TikTok and cold bodies everywhere.
On the premise of magic we decided, our brand would take beauty and give it an unexpected twist.
Our products incite magic, involve your senses and eliminate steps in your beauty routine.
We’re not just another beauty brand. We’re turning ordinary into the unexpected. We are classic beauty products, flipd.
Your support will enable us to revolutionize beauty products and help us to grow our presence online and launch into distribution in coming years.

BodyCoat is a one-of-a-kind warming body lotion that delivers up to 45 minutes of wearable warmth—perfect for cold rooms, outdoor nights, travel days, and anywhere in between. Reapply up to 3x daily for longer-lasting warmth.
Engineered with our signature Toasty Tech™, it activates on skin to deliver a targeted warming sensation that’s effective, and feels like magic.

Powered by Toasty Tech™, BodyCoat delivers temporary warmth through a blend of heat-activated ingredients designed to mimic your body’s natural thermal response. When applied to skin, it creates a warming sensation by supporting local circulation—without any external heat source.
Formulated for short-interval performance, Toasty Tech™ is ideal for cold environments like A/C-heavy indoor spaces, chilly travel days, sets, festivals, or brisk nights out.
The result? Cozy, invisible warmth right where you need it — all with a skin-loving, nourishing, vegan formula that absorbs fast, leaves no residue, and layers seamlessly under clothes.
Step 1: Using the built in applicator, apply a thin layer of BodyCoat to clean, dry skin
Step 2: Wait a few minutes for the warming sensation to activate
Step 3: Wash hands with cool water immediately after each use to avoid accidental application to eyes or mouth areas
Use our layering guide to determine the level of warmth you need for your skin & occasion
Tips: Reapply up to 3-4 times a day. Use under clothing for even more warmth!
Note: BodyCoat is not recommended for sensitive skin types.
BodyCoat is a multi-tasking body lotion and your ultimate beauty hack for many occasions:

title: Multak: The 10-in-1 Multi-functional EDC Tool Pen
description: Pen | Multi-functional EDC Outdoor Tool | Screwdriver | Window Breaker | Bottle Opener | Flashlight
allParagraphs: Pen | Multi-functional EDC Outdoor Tool | Screwdriver | Window Breaker | Bottle Opener | Flashlight

Multak 10-in-1 Multi-functional EDC Tool Pen is the World's First EDC Tool with Writing Pen, Graver Knife, Whistle, Survival Breaker, Screwdriver, Flashlight, Compass, and Bottle Opener. Manufactured with aluminum alloy is engineered to be durable and robust.
It provides a hearty grip for all of its functions. Multak provide solution to our daily needs, with just one handy tool.

The 10-in-1 Multi-functional EDC Tool Pen is suitable for everyday use or emergency situations. Perfect for everyday use, travel or outdoor activities with head design, handle thread design, excellent slip resistance.

Our EDC Tool Pen is an irreplaceable thing for each person and one of the most practical and interesting things. Our handle is perfect for any pocket, and its stability on the surface will amaze you! You no longer have to worry and fuss.
You can be replaced with one swift move, and it will meet your different needs. The reverse thread screws make the kit more stable and not loose.
The 10-in-1 Multi-functional EDC Tool Pen is features:
Writing Pen

We designed the Multak Pen to have a perfect balance in your hand. So your writing will always be in maximum comfort. From creative minds comes a creative pen - natural and unique. With four refills are included with your pen.
Graver Knife

The carving knife with excellent cutting performance and corrosion resistance, nice fit for your EDC use. Combined Carving and a well-writing pen together that allows you to excite inspiration and release stress in your everyday life.
Whether it's boxes, paper, rope, tags, plastic, or bags, this blade can handle it.
Bottle Opener
Solid bottle opener - Open any bottle cap with ease.
Flashlight + SOS Light

When the sun goes down, you can keep on exploring or light up your campsite, with the light beads that can last up to 5 hours! The SOS mode making it an excellent survival item. No matter outdoors camping, hiking, night walking or at home during a power outage, checking your automobile on the roadside, you may use it as lighting device to see.
flashlight
SOS Light
Survival Breaker

The super compact glass breaker is on top of the Multak Pen. It has a sharp but safer and wider push away tip. When the tempered glass is breaking, the wider tip will push the fragments away from your hand in an emergency.
Slotted or Phillips Screwdriver
The flathead screwdriver, useful for tightening screws that you never thought needed to tighten.
Outer Hex Wrench
A very handy tool to have, features a one piece loop handle construction for extra strength.
Whistle
It is integrated with a loud whistle which is uniquely designed to produce a tone to attract.
Compass

Whether you are hiking, camping, backpacking, or even teaching the boy scouts to find their way, the accuracy of the compass will never leave you guessing which direction is North. The compass is the ultimate tool for guiding you through all of your outdoor adventures.
The designer shaped Multak from a solid metal, using the quality technology and anodizing process, and is resistant to staining and corrosion as well to achieve fine appearance and great durability.

The Pen is designed to be compact, with a strong, lightweight body which offers maximum strength-to-weight ratio, for a rugged, durable pen for men & women that’s also ultra-light for everyday carry. This is a great addition to your personal survival gear.

Multak EDC Tool Pen can easy clips  on your pocket for quick, convenient access in a pocket for quick and easy access Insert it into your pocket as easily as a normal pen, and it will become a part of daily work and rest.
the handle part adopts thread design to allow a thumb grip,  ergonomic principles non-slip to fully transfer your power to the target. No matter what kind of table you put the pen on, it won’t slip.

title: Freebord 5-X: The latest In Skateboard Technology
description: The sensation of snowboarding with the convenience of a skateboard
allParagraphs: The sensation of snowboarding with the convenience of a skateboard

The Freebord 5-X replicates the movement of a snowboard on pavement. Everyone loves fresh powder and perfect bluebird conditions, but the reality for most of us is that the resorts are far away, and the snow conditions aren’t always great. If your passion is snowboarding then you're in luck. Say goodbye to expensive lift tickets, long lift lines, and getting snaked by Jerry. Get the Freebord 5-X and turn any neighborhood into your personal snowboard run.

The latest feature of the new truck system is the independent suspension hangers. This new design eliminates the stiff response of a traditional skateboard bushing and maximizes the turning radius of the board to match the same trajectory as a snowboard.

For years beginners have struggled to master the technique of edge control. The Freebord 5-X delivers a playful and forgiving ride with precise and predictable transfers. The new system makes going edge-to-edge simple and fun.
Another benefit of the 5-X design is that the springs smooth out the ride over rough surfaces and dampen vibrations making for one of the smoothest rides ever.

Do you like jibbing and park tricks? Well, this design changes everything because of the way they disperse weight across each individual edge wheel. This opens up the doors for butters and a whole new world of tricks we've yet to even scratch the surface.

In Freebording lingo, the term rocker refers to the distance the edge wheels are raised above the ground. This effect is what gives riders the ability to drift, carve, and slide the board in a lateral motion. The motion of sliding a Freebord is different from a longboard or traditional skateboard because unlike kicking out a power slide, sliding on a Freebord is about shifting weight from edge-to-edge. Just like snowboarding, you can apply more pressure on an edge to control your stopping power. The Freebord 5-X was designed to replicate the feeling of snowpack underneath your board.

Since 1998, we have always stayed true to the progression of our board. We don’t make false claims about being the absolute best snowboard simulator. These are simply facts that have been proven year-after-year by a worldwide rider base of avid snowboarders.

We have customers who report back saying that they rode black diamonds on their first day of snowboarding. There are countless others who are simply happy to keep their snow legs fresh all year long. Whether you're getting ready for the next season or just trying to keep the momentum going, picking up a Freebord is the way to go.

In addition to the four edge wheels, the Freebord has two additional center wheels on the board’s centerline that rotate 360 degrees. The center wheels are slightly closer to the ground than the edge wheels.  This is what simulates the base of a snowboard allowing riders to initiate slides in any direction, check their speed or stop like they would on snow.

By positioning your weight over the board's edges you can carve deep turns.  Shift weight to the base, and—just like a snowboard—it slides, allowing riders to check speed, navigate tight terrain, drift a 180 into switch or come to a complete stop.

Our goal is to bring Freebording to neighborhoods around the world. After 20 years of doing business, we are excited to bring to life our vision of snowboarding the streets. We believe in being a rider owned and operated business and need a strong community of riders, supporters, and backers of this project to make this dream of ours come true. Get your lift ticket for life by backing this project and ordering the Freebord 5-X. We look forward to catching you out on the streets! ~Freebord Mfg.

Business Inquiries email: Bob@freebord.com
General Questions email: Info@freebord.com

title: The Lords of Verona - 1262
description: The first real "Tribute watch of Verona town"
allParagraphs: The first real "Tribute watch of Verona town"
Our tribute to a dynasty of Noble lords and leaders, who have contributed to making the history of the city of Verona in Italy, gathering at their court nationally renowned artists.

A limited and numbered collection: for each series we propose 11 chronograph models and 11 automatic models. A total of 300 numbered pieces with chrono movements and 300 numbered pieces with automatic movements.

Years 40's: an icon of watchmaking was born. Year 2020: the legend reinvents itself in a contemporary fashion. We were inspired by an icon of the past, a model of the 30's - 40's that is still among the most sought after by collectors all over the world. A timepiece that has made the history of watchmaking, a timeless, legendary icon. We transported it into the 21st century, modernizing it just enough to make it even more immortal in the memory of all those who have seen, worn or even dreamed of it. From unattainable, we will make it available to all those who have always wanted it. Its shape, style and charisma are now featuring in this new model. We developed two models, a chronograph with a hybrid mechanical quartz movement, and an automatic custom movement only time. A product conceived, designed and created with passion, and to which we dedicated a refined attention to detail. Discover with us this new Italian proposal that revives, updating it, a timeless icon of wrist watchmaking. A "must have" within everyone's reach. We restyled its external layout, blending it with an iconic new brand that is meant to be a tribute to the millennial history of the amazing Italian city of Verona.

The movement Seiko NH35 (or NH35A) is a 24-jewel automatic caliber based on the 7s26. It is therefore a robust and reliable movement. Being a "strong and very reliable movement", it has no finishes or aspects aimed at particularly increasing its prestige, compared to the high-end movements. This movement guarantees great reliability and good precision at a competitive price. Nevertheless, in our case, the caliber has been embellished with a specific customization that includes an "IP Yellow Gold" plating for the rotor, and a laser engraving on the visible part of the oscillating weight.

The diameter is 27.4 mm and the thickness is 5.32 mm. The rotor charges bidirectionally and the power reserve is 41 hours. It features a date at 3 o'clock, machine stop and the ability to wind it manually, unlike the 7s26 caliber which does not provide the possibility of manual winding.

The claimed accuracy stands at an error of -35/+ 40 seconds per day; however, when properly tuned, its performance is usually closer to -15/+ 15 seconds per day. It operates at a frequency of 21600 oscillations per hour, therefore an average frequency. The shock protection system is the Diashock, which is the standard shock protection system adopted by Seiko. The customized rotor, although it may seem a "trivial" thing, is actually synonymous with great attention to detail, reflected in all the technical and construction details of ours watches.
The movement of the Chronograph models, is a Miyota Cal. OS21-10Z by Citizen
Balance Weight  Minute 0.40 μN.m  /  Second 0.11 μN.m  /  Small 0.02 μN.m
Battery Life  5 years
Accuracy  ±20 sec per month
Height   5.10mm
Function  Chrono min/sec, 24 hour / Date

Our First 8 Official Ambassadors
The "Pulsometric Scale" on the dials
This is our tribute to all the doctors, nurses and medical staff for this particular and difficult moment, but also a way of reminding everyone how important our health is.

Each watch is numbered. Furthermore, we wish to dedicate an even more exclusive and special treat to the most rigorous and detail looking collectors, with the two initial references and the two final references, the two numbers 1 of 300 and the two numbers 300 of 300.
This project is truly Italian

Verona is one of the most visited art cities in Italy. Once received your new watch, if you will ever have the chance to visit our beautiful Verona, come to visit us. Our flagship store is located in the heart of the ancient city, in front of the entrance to the courtyard of Juliet's House: we look forward to meeting you and offering you a good coffee !

Best known for its Shakespeare associations, Verona attracts a multinational gaggle of tourists to its pretty piazzas and knot of lanes, most in search of Romeo, Juliet and all that. But beyond the  Renaissance romance, Verona is a bustling center, its heart dominated by a huge, remarkably well-preserved 1st-century amphitheater, the venue for the city’s annual summer opera festival. Add to that countless churches, a couple of architecturally fascinating bridges over the Adige, regional wine and food from the Veneto hinterland and some impressive art, and Verona shapes up as one of northern Italy's most attractive cities. And all this just a short hop from the shores of stunning Lake Garda.

Davide, with decades of experience in the world of accessories, bijoux, jewelry and watches. For over 15 years he had followed the product development and related manufacturing activities for leading Italian international brands, in the watch and bijoux sector. Since 2000 he has been designing and developing watch collections under the "Damotime™ Verona" brand, spotting various fashion trends. Since 2015, he has dedicated himself to a new entrepreneurial venture with her own brand GIULIETTAVERONA®. In 2018 conceives the "I Signori di Verona" project and, between the end of 2019 and the beginning of 2020, he has been developing the collection to be launched on Kickstarter.

Monica, the elegant and contemporary soul of the team. For 20 years she has been working in the jewelry and accessories sector with passion and dedication. She has a particular flair for style and trends, and is naturally inclined to spot beauty. In her work she relates to customers and suppliers with empathy, attention to detail and pragmatism. A counterbalance to the originality and creative twist brought by Davide, with whom she shares the most beautiful projects of their lives.

Alessandro, with him ideas materialize in the form of sketches, drawings, photos, visuals, creative concepts. Rational and thoughtful, he is the perfect mix between Davide's exuberance and Monica's pragmatism. Since the start of the GIULIETTAVERONA® project in 2015, Alessandro is the one who knows how to put the team's ideas on paper, making them effective and adding that "artist's touch" to each project.

We have decided to create a real Limited Edition: once sold out, the models of a certain series will no longer be produced. Each new series will be offered with some differentiating elements. We want our products to be special and unique to you.Our commitment to those who will support us is to continue bringing to light new projects and exclusive proposals.
Please, trust us and join us in this adventure: you will be thrilled !

title: ZETTA 1024: 2X Faster Portable Tire Inflator
description: 2-150PSI\23L/min\2X Faster Pump Time\4+N Model\Large LCD Screen Display\Real-time Tire Pressure
allParagraphs: 2-150PSI\23L/min\2X Faster Pump Time\4+N Model\Large LCD Screen Display\Real-time Tire Pressure
When you encounter a sudden blowout or an unexpected flat tire while driving down the road, you probably feel helpless and anxious. Yet the above situations will double your anxiety.

Zetta 1024 portable wireless tire inflator adopts an advanced motor to quickly inflate the tire within 6 minutes. The smart display can also show the real-time pressure value, up to 150psi, with a wide range of adaptability. Just 3 basic steps to inflate quickly.

No worries even if you don't know how to operate the product. Zetta 1024 comes with a large-screen smart display, and 3 easy steps to operate. Moreover, the design of Zetta 1024 is simple and compact, only the size of a mug. It won't take up much space in the car.

With a powerful and high-performance motor, Zetta 1024 can quickly and effectively inflate a tire, and reach up to 23L/min airflow. Inflating a Tesla tire (235/40 R19) from 29PSI to 35PSI only takes 90s. Wave goodbye to those slow tire inflators. With Zetta 1024, you can rapidly inflate tires in a flash and quickly get on the road.
The large screen can display real-time and the preset pressure value simultaneously. The battery level is visible on the screen too, which is very easy to read and understand.

4 preset inflation modes are shown on the screen as well, including vehicles, motorcycles, bicycles and balls, making it easier for beginners to choose. Manual mode is also available for other inflation needs.

The manual setting mode allows you to set the pressure value (3-150PSI) according to the types of inflatables. It is very easy to set up to meet your various inflatables needs. Besides, it also provides convertible BAR/PSI units for your convenience.
The air pump will stop automatically once the real-time detected pressure reaches the preset pressure. Not necessary to manually stop the air pump and check the tire pressure repeatedly.

DC/AC power cord is unnecessary. The portable design of GZetta 1024 with built-in 12V 2600mAh*3 rechargeable battery,  which can work continuously for 40 minutes (under 35PSI pressure condition) on one full charge. Up to 100 days ultra-long standby time once fully charged. Free from worries about no power in an emergency.
Zetta 1024 is well-designed with a heat dissipation system to ensure the high performance of fast inflation.

The bottom of Zetta 1024 is equipped with a USB Type-C charging port that supports fast charging technology. It also comes with a 5V/2A USB-A output port that can charge your mobile phone or device on the go. It can also be used as a power bank in an emergency situation.
There is a 2-mode LED light on the product top, providing convenience for you to inflate tires in the dark.

Zetta 1024 is equipped with 5 different nozzles, It's not only great for pumping tires but also can be used as a pump for inflating your sports balls, balloons, swimming rings and other inflatable products.

title: Titanium OFUK - Open Frame Utility Knife
description: A minimalist utility knife perfect for Everyday Carry (EDC)
allParagraphs: A minimalist utility knife perfect for Everyday Carry (EDC)
We are very excited to introduce our latest creation: Titanium OFUK™ - Open Frame Utility Knife.
Small and lightweight to carry anywhere.  There when you need it most!
Easy to open and close with just one hand.
Symmetrical design so you can operate with either hand.
Choose the length of blade extension to fit your cutting need and control the depth of your incision.
Removing dull blades and inserting new ones is easy, or simply rotate to the other half of the blade that is still sharp.
Fit any standard utility blade. There is an endless selection for you to choose, from straight to serrated edge, stainless steel, titanium nitride coated to ceramic material.
It simply disappears in your pocket.  No bulk!
Weighs only 0.5 oz. without blade, and 0.7 oz. with blade; About the weight of three US quarter dollar coins.
The unique single body, open frame is precision machined from Grade 5 Titanium billet.
The slide button is made with premium 17-4 stainless steel material. An undercut chamfer beneath the button allows you to lift it up with your finger to dis-engage the blade.
Pre-order your Titanium OFUK Now!

Have you ever had an "OFUK" moment when you tried to use your knife and found its edge dulled or covered with gooey, sticky stuff?  If you are a knife guy, leave the dirty work to its little brother, the utility knife!

- TITANIUM: Grade 5 Titanium (6Al-4V) is as light as aluminum, but as strong as steel.  Plus, it is corrosive resistant.  This premium material, used to be reserved exclusively for the aerospace industry, is the favorite material for EDC enthusiasts.

- PVD Color Finish: PVD stands for Physical Vapor Deposition, a finishing process for vaporizing a proprietary solid compound in a high-tech vacuum chamber before it is deposited onto the surface of the part, atom by atom.  The result is a high performance finish that is super durable, scratch resistant and improves the appearance of the part.

We wanted to design a perfect utility knife that we can use everyday.  The goal was simple: it has to be very easy to use and small.  Our eureka moment happened when we realized that most cutting jobs do not need the blade to be locked in place since the cutting movement is perpendicular to the blade edge.  After coming up with the slide button design that relies on friction and detents at the close and open positions, we realized two more things.  First, we can stop the blade at any position between the close and fully open position.  This lets us use the knife in special ways, like cutting the box with a controlled blade length and without cutting the content inside.  Second, since we can squeeze the button on both sides, we can basically hold the blade for puncturing/stabbing motion just like it's locked in place.
We already paid the tooling and CNC fixtures for the frame and the slide button.  Everything is ready for production.
Back us today and you will be the first to receive the Titanium OFUK at a great discount!

We have successfully launched and fulfilled eight projects. We learned a lot from our past manufacturing and fulfillment processes. There are always risks and unexpected issues in launching a new product.
The factory already made a lot of samples for us. All the tooling is finished and production will begin once the campaign ends.
We will post regular project updates to keep you informed of our progress.
IMPORTANT NOTICE:

Please note that YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CUSTOMS FEES, DUTIES, VAT, IMPORT TAXES, SPECIAL DELIVERY FEES ADMINISTERED BY YOUR GOVERNMENT, AND HANDLING FEES. These are not included in the cost of shipping or handling of your rewards, and we are unable to estimate those fees for you.

title: WONDER FEET INSOLE-athlete's foot & foot odor care
description: The Wonder feet has an Antibacterial copper fabric insole for control of athlete's foot & foot odor.
allParagraphs: The Wonder feet has an Antibacterial copper fabric insole for control of athlete's foot & foot odor.

Applying Wonder-C Tex (*antibacterial fabric) that kills harmful substances such as athlete's foot bacteria and fungus and suppresses foot odor, Inevitable Insole proves its efficiency just with insole replacement. Wonder Feet Inevitable Insole is here to help you if you’re suffering from athlete’s foot and foot odor.
It is known that 15% of the world's population has athlete's foot. 1 out of every 6 people has athlete's foot bacteria, and millions of people visit hospitals every year to receive treatment.

Athlete's foot occurs with an infection by a fungus called 'Trichophyton Rubrum', and once it occurs, it becomes contagious, moving from skin to skin as a parasite. Athlete’s foot bacteria can be infected to the face and ears, as well as toes, fingers and feet. Due to this contagiousness, the bacteria continuously re-occurs and it should be completely eradicated.
1.  Foot (athlete’s foot infiltrates feet)
2.  Athlete’s foot bacteria breeds inside the shoes
3.  You try to weaken the bacteria by washing your feet and putting ointment on,
4.  but the moment you put your feet back into the shoes, the bacteria infiltrates again
5.   Vicious cycle repeats itself
But with Wonder Feet?
1. Foot infected with athlete's foot bacteria
2. From the moment you put on the Wonder Feet shoes, the athlete’s foot bacteria will be attacked, weakened and killed
3.   When you take off your shoes, the Wonder Feet insole attacks the athlete's foot bacteria, killing them
4.   When you keep your feet clean, athlete’s foot bacteria gradually weaken
Wonder-C Tex is a new anti-bacterial material made by whipping 99.9 % of pure copper into slices thinner than human hair.

It is called "Antibacterial copper" due to the natural occurrence of antibacterial activity in copper.   By acting on bacteria and viruses such as E-coli and food poisoning bacteria, antimicrobial copper is highly effective in preventing infectious diseases and cross infection.  It is the strongest and non-toxic human-friendly antibacterial material, being a natural material.

There is little variation in the antimaterial activity regardless of the particle size. Also, it has much better antibacterial power than silver (nano) and ceramic materials because it does not create resistant bacteria even after time.

Antimicrobial effect stays unaffected by the external environment including heat and humidity. Antibacterial copper is a semi-permanent material that maintains its antibacterial powers even after discoloration or abrasion.

Antibacterial copper is a natural antibacterial material that is harmless to the human body and the environment. It is 100% recyclable because no added chemicals are required, thanks to the natural antibacterial effects of copper itself. Even in recycled copper, the effect remains unchanged.

In 2011, Dr. William Keevil of the University of Southampton, England, conducted an experiment to compare the antibacterial powers between 10 million super bacteria on stainless steel and on copper. While the super bacteria on stainless steel remained alive, those on copper were almost entirely killed in 9 minutes.
In an average of 1 hour, the stench has dropped by over 90%.
Ammonia ㅣHydrogen sulfide ㅣTrimethylamine ㅣ Methyl Mercaptan
KATRI Examination Researcher says
“Test results show that the bacteria cannot be seen under the microscope, which means this is an inhibition stage”
On top of wearing Wonder Feet, apply other athlete’s foot medication on the market to maximize treatment effect. (Including toe-type athlete’s foot)
This is because Wonder Feet can both care for the foot and shoe environments where athlete’s foot bacteria breed.

Also, we recommend using Wonder Feet Insoles in matching numbers as your daily shoes to enhance effectiveness. This is to prevent the possibility of cross-contamination that could happen when you switch to normal soles from Wonder Feet soles.
Hello friend.
I'm Yuni,   the founder of Wonder Feet.   I would like to briefly introduce how the WONDER FEET came into the world.

Originally, I had a job of making and distributing shoes in S. Korea. However, the shoes I usually sell have the cheapest insole to minimize cost, and I was always unsatisfied with the lack of cushioning because my feet were not comfortable.

I had a chance to talk with the boss of a partner company, when I found out that using good materials makes more comfortable insoles. So, I developed an insole using a thick latex (6mm) without worrying about the cost and applied it to shoes and heels, which was met with positive response by the customers.

Since then, I became more interested in people's feet and started to study the various types of functional insoles. But the question was why premium functional insoles were limited to foot arches, cushioning and structural problems.

Actually, I thought the real issue with people's feet was athlete's foot and foot odor. Of course, not everyone has these problems, but I knew for a fact that quite a lot of people are suffering from this problem.
I thought I had a solution to solve this problem by connecting it with the insole. Because feet are always in shoes and shoes are always laid with insoles.
After desperately searching for a way, I finally found my answer.
I thought it would be really cool if people could just say goodbye to the repulsive itch and shameful foot odor by simply replacing their insoles.
So, I named my invention, Wonder Feet. Of course, arch supports and shock absorbing cushioning are basic functions.

If you are suffering from athlete's foot, itching, foot odor for a long period of time, or are afraid to know how to prevent them, I recommend trying out Wonder Feet. I’m more than confident they will help!
Your friend,
Yuni
Q.  Is Wonder Feet only applicable to athlete’s foot patients and those with foot odor?

A.  No. Athlete’s foot and foot odor are very common problems exposed to everyone, because they result from fungus bacteria that are easily infected even with the smallest contact with people around you.
Q.  Is Wonder Feet effective on toenail athlete’s foot, as well?

A.   Toenail-type athlete’s foot lasts longer and is more difficult to eradicate than athlete’s foot. Wonder Fit effectively creates an environment in which athlete’s foot bacteria cannot thrive, even for toe-type disease.
Q. What if the odor remains even after I wear Wonder Feet insole?

A.  Wonder Feet is not a deodorant, the odor eliminating effect doesn’t come magically as soon as you put it on. The antibacterial copper fabric needs time to reduce the bacteria and odor. Foot odor will be eliminated in as early as 3 day, and usually within 7 days. But in case of severe symptoms, it could take up to a maximum of 15 days.
Q. Does Wonder Feet help with plantar fasciitis?
A. Of course. Wonder Feet has adopted a proper cushion and arch support structure to help people suffering foot pain.
Q. Does it help with ankle or back pain?

A. Wonder Feet's arch supports and heel features help your feet to better support your body's load.  If the arch of a foot collapses, it causes the body to lose balance. Wonder Feet insole will help both feet work well together to balance.
Q. How thick is the insole?
A.   Wonder feet has a thickness of 4mm for proper cushioning. Usually, insoles are about 2~3mm thick. So, it is recommended to use Wonder Feet in shoes that are slightly looser than others.
Q. Do the insoles come in children’s sizes, too?
A.   Unfortunately, we could not prepare the children's size for this moment. But we’ll consider them if there are requests by the consumers.

title: APWCS Fundraiser
description: APWCS: The Smart, Hands-Free Way to Clean Up After Your Dog—So You Never Have To.
allParagraphs: APWCS: The Smart, Hands-Free Way to Clean Up After Your Dog—So You Never Have To.
? Autonomous Pet Waste Collection System (APWCS)
No more scooping. No more stink. Just clean yards—automatically.
? Short Summary

Hi, I’m Fred Kahl—a retired USMC officer, lifelong problem-solver, and now a mission-driven entrepreneur. As a dad, a dog owner, and someone who believes in dignity through technology, I created the Autonomous Pet Waste Collection System (APWCS)—a smart, AI-powered robot that cleans up after your dog so you don’t have to.

Why does this matter? Because millions of people deal with the daily hassle of picking up pet waste—and it’s more than just gross. It’s a health risk, an environmental pollutant, and a barrier to enjoying your own yard. APWCS changes that.

With your help, we’ll turn a working prototype into a production-ready solution that keeps your lawn clean and your hands poop-free. You’re not just funding a gadget—you’re backing a cleaner, smarter future for pet owners everywhere.
? What We Need & What You Get
We’re seeking $125,000 to fund:
Final hardware design and ruggedization
FCC and EPA compliance testing
App and AI integration
Small-batch manufacturing run (500 units)
Packaging, shipping, and support setup
Perks for Backers
? Early Bird Special: Get the APWCS at 40% off MSRP
? Branded Swag: Shirts, hats, and “No Poop Left Behind” decals
? Beta Tester Access: Become part of the inner circle giving feedback on v1.0
? “Poop Happens” Supporter Badge: For anyone who just wants to pitch in a few bucks and join the cause
If we fall short of our full goal, we’ll scale the first production run accordingly and still deliver rewards on time. No vaporware. No excuses.
? The Impact
This isn’t just about convenience—it’s about health, dignity, and sustainability:
Public health: Pet waste is a leading carrier of parasites and bacteria.
Environmental impact: APWCS prevents storm drain contamination and reduces plastic bag use.
Veteran workforce: We aim to assemble units at veteran-run facilities and employ transitioning service members for support and logistics.
This campaign isn’t our first rodeo. We’ve brought military-grade systems to life under pressure—now we’re applying that same discipline to a product that helps families every day.
You’re funding more than a robot. You’re enabling a mission.
? Risks & Challenges
Let’s be honest—this is hardware, and hardware is hard. Here’s what we’re watching closely:
Outdoor reliability: Terrain, weather, and dog unpredictability. We’re solving this with rugged components and field testing across multiple climates.
Cost control: Robotics ain’t cheap, but we’ve designed APWCS to scale using common parts and modular components.
AI accuracy: The robot must identify pet waste without error. We’re training the system using thousands of images and real-world feedback from testers.

What qualifies us? I’ve led logistics and engineering programs in the USMC, advised technology startups, and built project teams under fire. We’ve got the discipline and the bench to get this over the finish line.
? Other Ways You Can Help
Not everyone can contribute—and that’s OK. You can still:
Share this campaign on social media, in your dog owner groups, or with your local HOA
Use Indiegogo’s share tools to spread the word
Tag us with #APWCS and show the world that there’s finally a better way to deal with dog poop
Ready to back a cleaner, smarter backyard? Let’s scoop the future—together.

title: Freebike: Gamified Studio Cycling At Your Home
description: 22'' Rotating Touchscreen|World Class Instructors|All Access Membership|Vibe-Synced Special Effects
allParagraphs: 22'' Rotating Touchscreen|World Class Instructors|All Access Membership|Vibe-Synced Special Effects

Discover an immersive cycling experience that motivates you to come back for more. Freebike is a gamified studio cycling + strength hub, and your ultimate fitness companion at home. Say goodbye to the boring fitness routine and pedal to the beat of your own rhythm.

Embark on a whole new workout routine with a variety of on-demand classes. Turn on freebeat and never endure another dull moment during your fitness journey with its energetically curated music and beat-based choreography.

At freebeat, our rockstar instructors come from the world's top-notch studios such as Soulcycle, Flywheel, Equinox, and Cyclebar. Throughout the training process, the instructors will guide you through each workout session and motivate you to achieve your goals.

The rockstar instructors have a wide range of experience in various training areas. Also, they have appeared on The Tonight Show, SNL, and led the cycling courses for the First Lady of the United States. In some cases, booking the instructor's signature sessions at your local studios can be a challenge. No matter when you want to train, we always have you covered with their on-demand courses when you're ready to drop some sweats.
Keep your workout fresh with different curated high-energy music and well-designed choreography as you pedal to your own beat.

Refresh, recharge and enjoy the beat of your own life whether you're doing pushups, dips, tapback, or other workout moves. The dynamic choreography is designed to unleash your strength and potential to the fullest by exercising every muscle.
Experience studio fitness from the comfort of your own home with thousands of on-demand courses to choose from every day.
Take your fitness routine to the next level and discover several exclusively selected courses such as indoor cycling, Barre, HIIT, kickboxing, and more. Feel the energy and give it your all.

Freebike includes a free 90-day membership ($117 Value) to interactive and on-demand fitness. You can access ALL on-demand classes with rockstar instructors, gamified workouts, and performance tracking that you and your family will love.
Make your fitness routine fun and enjoy the membership loyalty program and challenges that reward you with real gifts to motivate you every step of your fitness journey.
Create up to 10 individual profiles so that everyone in your household can access our complete library of on-demand courses under one membership.
Turn the screen, get off the bike, and follow your personal trainer on a 22" HD touchscreen for cross-training.

Thanks to the 180° degree rotating design, you can place the freebike anywhere in your training room and follow your trainer from any angle. It also features anti-fingerprint and anti-glare technology for a continuous fitness session.
Lighten up your fitness routine with the gamification system. Freebike offers a fun interactive game in which you ride to the rhythm and score by how accurate you pedal on the beat.
The gamification system also allows you to connect and compete with your friends and family. Accept the challenge and climb up the leaderboard to make the most out of your fitness adventure.
The freebeat app knows your favorite and personalizes course recommendations for your own vibe. Our sensors won't miss a single pedal and you'll get instant performance tracking results.
Our system analyzes your performance in the past and recommends the best training program according to your preferences. Each smart class recommendation would be your favorite.
With the mobile app integration, you get instant feedback from our instructors and track your performance at every beat. Share your dynamic moves on social media with your friends and family!

Find your favorite and discover a new workout theme to love. We design tailored CGI animations that stimulate the vibe of each class to give you a fresh atmosphere each time. Feel the vibe and tune in to your fitness routine with various themes such as federal holidays, co-branding, and popular tunes!
Immerse yourself in our synchronized visual and auditory creation for ultimate motivation with unique breath lighting that moves with your beat.

Freebike comes with a pair of chic-design motion-tracking smart dumbbells with a performance tracker that empowers you to explore all gamified strength classes. title: Femme Fitness: A gym where women come first
description: Power built for women, by women. This is her space.
allParagraphs: Power built for women, by women. This is her space.

Femme fitness was born from a simple truth: too many women feel unseen, unsafe, or unsupported in traditional fitness spaces. Whether it's gym anxiety, lack of childcare, or feeling like you have to fit a certain mold to belong, most gyms weren't built for us.
We're changing that.

Femme Fitness is a women only gym designed for real life. We're creating a powerful space where women of all ages, sizes, and backgrounds can move, lift, breathe and thrive without judgement. Where new moms can actually show up for themselves because we offer on site childcare. Where fitness feels like empowerment, not punishment. Where community replaces competition.
We're starting in Queens, NYC, but our vision is bigger. We want femme fitness to be a blueprint for what women deserve in wellness: safety, support, strength, and sisterhood.
This campaign is your chance to bring this to life.

By backing Femme Fitness, you're not just funding a gym. You're investing in a future where women don't have to choose between their health, their children, or their peace. You're helping us build a sanctuary of strength and you're becoming a founding force in something bigger.
Starting a business, especially in NYC, comes with real challenges. But we've done our homework and built Femme Fitness with intention, flexibility, and a clear path to success.

Commercial leases in Queens can be competitive and expensive. We're already scouting locations and working with local real estate professionals to ensure we find a space that meets our needs and fits our budget.

Opening a gym with a cafe and childcare requires health, safety, and zoning compliance. We've already begun researching NYC's regulations and will be working with experienced professionals to manage timelines and approvals properly.
Buildouts sometimes face delays due to supply chain issues or permitting. To prepare, we're building in a buffer in our timeline and budget to keep things on track.

Like any new business, our first few months will focus on building awareness and community. But we've already started developing our waitlist, marketing plan, and partnerships and with your help, we'll launch with momentum.

This business is founder led with heart and hustle but launching a full scale gym takes a team. We're focused on hiring a small, experienced staff and outsourcing where needed so nothing is overlooked.
We're not afraid of the challenge, we're motivated by them. Every step we take brings us closer to building a space women truly deserve.
Not everyone can give and that's okay. Femme Fitness is about community, and there are so many powerful ways to help us grow beyond money.
Spread the word on social media, in group chats, or with friends and family. Your share could bring in someone who's been waiting for a gym like this.
Know a mom, student, or woman who wants a gym where she feels safe and seen? Send them our story.
Follow us on Instagram @femmefitnesscenter  and like, comment or save our posts. Engagement helps is reach more people and we notice every single one.
Even if you're not in NYC, your support on our waitlist helps us build proof that women want spaces like this everywhere.   https://form.typeform.com/to/Y3j1Sd8f
Mention Femme Fitness in your conversations, stories, or even during your next coffee date. We're building a movement and word of mouth is magic.
Your encouragement matters more than you know. We're creating a bold, brave, and beautiful and your belief fuels every step.
