ARMIK.UA represents a modified extension of its predecessor, WONDERTOOL™ - a Portable Washer with Ozone. Visit for more information  https://www.armik.com.ua
WONDERTOOL™ offers a range of specialized solutions:
WONDERTOOL™ for SPORTS: Ideal for when you have only a few sports items to wash daily while ensuring the preservation of high-tech sports fabric properties.

WONDERTOOL™ for BABIES: Designed for daily washing of children's clothing, as gentle baby skin is not compatible with chemical washing powders, while also offering protection against harmful germs and viruses.
WONDERTOOL™ for URBAN LIVING: A convenient alternative to handwashing or frequent trips to the laundromat, especially in scenarios where space is limited.

WONDERTOOL™ for HEALTH: The ultimate choice for home anti-bacterial and anti-viral protection. It is particularly useful for sanitizing fruits and vegetables and for individuals with sensitive skin prone to reactions from detergent residues on clothes.
WONDERTOOL™ offers a variety of benefits:
Wash without detergent: Protect your skin while effectively sterilizing against germs and viruses.
Wash to eliminate pesky germs and viruses: Prioritize your health by ensuring your clothes are free from harmful pathogens.
Wash in cold water: Save energy and prevent clothes from shrinking during the laundry process.
Gentle washing without twisting: Keep delicate fabrics from stretching by using a gentle cycle.
Dry cleaning for clothes and footwear: Eliminate odors like sweat and smoke from your garments and shoes.
Cleaning fruits and vegetables: Enjoy clean, germ-free food that's safe to eat.
Cleaning toys: Ensure the sterilization and cleanliness of children's toys and supplies.
House cleaning with ozonated water: Achieve unparalleled cleanliness in your home by effectively removing germs and viruses.
Air purification with ozonated water: Experience cleaner and fresher air, akin to the aftermath of a thunderstorm.
Car ventilation system disinfection: Utilize ozonized air for superior disinfection of your car's ventilation system.

The SECRET lies in enriching the water with OZONE – ozone serves as a natural defender and cleanser for our environment. You probably recall the fresh, invigorating scent that lingers after a thunder and lightning storm - that's the result of ozone at work! The advantage of ozone treatment stems from its potent oxidation capabilities and its capacity to alter and break down most organic substances. Ozone functions by dismantling the molecular bonds that bind dirt to your clothing. Ozone accomplishes this breakdown faster and more reliably than detergents, and it doesn't introduce any chemical residues into the water or your garments. Plus, it contributes to improving indoor air quality – achieve this with WONDERTOOL™ – it's an added benefit.

WONDERTOOL™ offers the convenience of doing your laundry without requiring a permanent connection to a water supply or drain. Its ergonomic design features a sturdy handle for effortless portability and a secure, tightly sealing lid for convenient loading and unloading of your laundry. WONDERTOOL™ operates on AC 110-240 volts, weighs 11 pounds (5 kilograms) without any load, and can handle washing loads of up to 6 pounds (3 kilograms). Its dimensions are 13 inches by 15 inches by 13 inches.
WONDERTOOL™ simplifies your life and is compatible with Sonoff Wi-Fi Smart On/Off Timer, Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, and Google Assistant.

WONDERTOOL™ can be placed virtually anywhere: on the floor, inside a shower cabin, in the bathtub, on a table or countertop, and even on the ground near your house or car. To ensure its safe operation in high humidity environments, we've designed it to use a low-voltage DC 12V power supply, similar to what you find in your car.

WONDERTOOL™ is your safeguard for you and your family. Ozone-based laundering effectively eliminates 99.9% of bacteria and viruses in just a matter of minutes, a result that traditional laundering with heat treatment can't match. WONDERTOOL™ replaces the need for many chemicals typically used to achieve exceptional results, relying solely on cold, ozone-saturated water.

Scientists at Fujita Health University told a news conference they had proven that ozone gas in concentrations of 0.05 to 0.1 parts per million (ppm), levels considered harmless to humans, could kill the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 (Covid-19) -"Reuters" - 2020/02/09

Stanford Student Housing custodial teams have been using the award-winning Cardinal Clean system to clean and sanitize close to 100 residence halls since its introduction in 2015. Cardinal Clean was more recently introduced to student residents in all undergraduate residences laundry rooms.  More machines are being installed on campus for student use.  This initiative makes Stanford the first US campus to offer students access to use this powerful and green cleaning solution for free.
Cardinal Clean is Stanford’s free, powerful & green cleaning standard. The Cardinal Clean machine electrifies tap water and oxygen to produce a completely sustainable, safe, and effective multi-purpose disinfectant. Kills 99.99% of germs, virus, and bacteria for 24 hours after dispensing. Non-toxic and non-irritant for your health. It saves you money because it’s free!  (https://rde.stanford.edu/studenthousing/cardina...)
WONDERTOOL™ not only conserves your finances with each laundry cycle but also recoups its cost within a matter of months, while safeguarding your well-being, which is invaluable.

"I washed my week-old sportswear without detergent and won't go back. Your laundry is killing your wallet. Your laundry is killing the environment. OZONE is the solution: I'm so impressed with the results that I haven't touched laundry detergent in a month and don't think I ever will again. In the first year alone, I'll save at least $400 on laundry detergent and hot water. Health and the environment are priceless!" -"Forbes" - 2021/03/28
WONDERTOOL™ - is designed to meet a wide range of everyday laundry needs:

Daily use of sportswear often results in dirt and unpleasant odors, and the need for a quick turnaround. With WONDERTOOL™, your beloved sportswear can be efficiently cleaned without the use of traditional chemical detergents, ensuring it's ready for use without residue chemical powder inside.

For everyday garments like shirts, blouses, and personal items, maintaining a fresh and clean appearance is essential. The last thing you want is someone else's dirt or stains from a public laundromat on them.

Indeed, children's clothes tend to accumulate daily, and there's often a constant need for them. It's essential to address this issue without exposing delicate baby skin to the potential risks associated with washing powder and germs.

Detergents can adhere strongly to fabrics and may not be completely removed even with repeated rinsing, posing potential health risks. Ozone effectively addresses the same task of reducing contamination and molecular bonding to textiles without the need for chemical detergents, making WONDERTOOL™ a safer and more eco-friendly option for washing clothes.

It's indeed an interesting irony that the conventional detergents we use to clean our clothes might actually leave them less clean due to residual soap and chemicals. When transitioning to laundry with WONDERTOOL™, you may notice suds even without adding any soap, highlighting the presence of these residues. By making the switch to ozone washing with WONDERTOOL™, you can prevent these chemicals from coming into contact with your skin and potentially entering your body, promoting a healthier and more eco-friendly laundry routine.

An important concern with regular washing machines, which may not effectively eliminate pathogenic germs and viruses at normal washing temperatures, potentially turning your laundry into a breeding ground for bacteria. Utilizing biosecurity practices and harnessing the biocidal properties of ozone to remove dirt, bacteria, and viruses from your laundry can significantly reduce or even eliminate the need for harsh detergents. This approach can help eliminate allergic reactions caused by detergent residues, leaving your clothes both sterile and naturally fresh when using the WONDERTOOL™.

The Washington Post -“If your clothes look clean but smell bad, they’re not clean" Absolutely, post-workout, nobody wants to be stuck with lingering sweaty odors in their clothing. Ozone emerges as the key solution to sever the connection between the smell and the fabric. Ozone sanitizing treatment is approximately 3,000 times more effective than bleach. It also demonstrates its prowess by eliminating MRSA and other antibiotic-resistant superbugs that are typically difficult to combat through conventional means.

WONDERTOOL's ozone-based laundry effectively eliminates 99% of bacteria and viruses in a matter of minutes, an outcome that traditional heat-based methods struggle to match. Conventional thermal washing studies reveal that nearly all pathogens require exposure to water at a scorching 160ºF (71ºC) for a lengthy 25-minute period to be rendered inactive. Moreover, the traditional process relies on a complex array of hazardous chemicals, including Chlorine, which is best avoided. In contrast, ozone initially oxidizes and eradicates bacteria and viruses before ultimately transforming into oxygen. With WONDERTOOL™, most of the chemicals needed for achieving exceptional results are replaced by cold, ozone-saturated water.

With WONDERTOOL™ you can put your mind at ease when it comes to your valuable natural silk and cashmere garments. Sorting your clothes into different fabric types or colors for separate loads is no longer necessary. With WONDERTOOL™, there's no need to fret about damaging your clothes. In fact, this ozonated cold water approach actually leaves your clothes feeling softer and fluffier while extending the lifespan of the fabric. You can trust that your clothes will emerge from the wash clean, devoid of any odors, grime, or chemical residues. Plus, there's no need to worry about the colors fading since WONDERTOOL™ washes in cold water, ensuring your colors stay vibrant and intact.

Traditional washing machines often subject clothes to significant wear and tear due to the dynamic loads of twisting and stretching, especially when combined with hot water and harsh chemicals. This process can lead to fabric degradation and abrasion over time. However, WONDERTOOL™'s ozone washing method reduces the use of chemicals and lowers the water temperature. As a result, it has been observed that fabric degradation is reduced by more than 50%, making it a gentler and more fabric-friendly laundry solution.

Clothes can sometimes absorb unpleasant odors even if they are not visibly soiled. This can happen with odors like cigarette smoke, sweat, or lingering perfume traces. In such cases, washing the clothes may not be necessary, but removing the absorbed odor and eliminating viruses and harmful bacteria is essential. WONDERTOOL™ offers a convenient solution that saves both time and money compared to traditional dry cleaning. Simply place the clothes in a plastic bag and use a silicone hose from WONDERTOOL™ to introduce dry OZONE, effectively refreshing and sanitizing the garments.

WONDERTOOL™ serves as an excellent solution for dry cleaning and eliminating unpleasant odors such as sweat and tobacco from a variety of items, including clothing, shoes, children's fabric toys, and pillows. Pathogenic microbes and viruses can linger on harder-to-disinfect surfaces for up to 24 hours, and in some cases, even up to 2-3 days. Fortunately, WONDERTOOL™ is equipped to remove 99% of known pathogenic microbes and viruses effectively. Simply place the soiled items inside (without water) and set the timer for 15 minutes to ensure the safety and well-being of yourself and your family.

Hand-washing fruits and vegetables, while important, typically removes only about 70% of pesticides and germs. However, ozone proves highly effective at disinfecting and killing 99% of bacteria and viruses while also reducing water and energy consumption. Achieving such thorough disinfection is more challenging with traditional washing methods that rely on copious amounts of hot water and even bactericides for sterilization. WONDERTOOL™ represents a superior bio-protection practice, ensuring your health by safeguarding against agro-chemicals, bacteria, and viruses, and promoting safer and more eco-friendly food preparation practices.
WONDERTOOL™ can effectively and gently cleanse fruits, berries, vegetables, and salad greens to a remarkable 99% level of purity in just a few minutes.

Ozone has gained approval from the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) as an antimicrobial agent as early as 2001. It has since been employed to combat both bacteria and chemical residues, making it a recognized and valuable tool in various applications, including food safety and hygiene.

WONDERTOOL™ can generate ozone-infused water for household cleaning purposes, effectively eradicating germs, bacteria, and viruses. Ozone produces a secondary oxidant, hydroxyl radicals, in the water, which is both more potent and less selective. These resulting free radicals, hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) and hydroxyl (OH), possess significantly higher oxidation potential than ozone itself, necessitating even shorter contact times of ozonated water with bacteria and viruses for complete destruction. It's important to note that freshly prepared water must be used, as ozone rapidly reverts to its normal oxygen state. This approach stands as the most effective means to ensure uncompromised cleanliness in your home, and it cannot be achieved without ozone-saturated water with hydrogen peroxide and hydroxyl from WONDERTOOL™.

WONDERTOOL™ offers the capability to sterilize a wide range of items, including children's toys, kitchen utensils, and personal hygiene products. However, it's important to note that prolonged and repeated exposure to ozone can have a deteriorating effect on rubber products. When was the last time you cleaned your razor, toothbrush, or makeup brush? With WONDERTOOL™, you can now restore them all to their original sterile cleanliness. Additionally, the ozonated water produced can be highly beneficial for watering houseplants, helping to safeguard them from fungi and harmful microbes.

WONDERTOOL™ not only cleans the air inside your home but also effectively eradicates 99% of microbes and viruses. It is particularly successful at eliminating unpleasant odors like cigarette smoke and mold. It's important to note that during the air purification process, neither people nor animals should be present in the room, and proper ventilation is required afterward. Many of us are familiar with the clean, fresh air that follows a thunder and lightning storm, and this is often attributed to ozone. WONDERTOOL™ can bring this wonderful natural effect into your home, enhancing the quality of the air you breathe.

WONDERTOOL™ can easily be connected to any home outlet with a voltage range of 110-240 volts. It operates in manual mode, where you use the on/off switch and timer for control. The specific washing time and the amount of load should be determined through testing and based on your preferences. Typically, a 20-minute cycle for washing followed by a 10-minute rinse cycle is sufficient. It's a straightforward and dependable process.

WONDERTOOL™ is engineered to run continuously, 24 hours a day, with 15-minute breaks scheduled every 60 minutes. This extended operation time allows for thorough air purification in your home, car, or boat, effectively removing foreign odors and infections. The result is improved air quality indoors, free from allergens, germs, and dust, leading to an enhanced quality of life. It's important to keep in mind that during the air purification process, neither people nor animals should be in the room, and adequate ventilation is required afterward to ensure the safety and comfort of occupants.

WONDERTOOL™ is an essential tool for cleaning the interior of your car, not only from odors but also from potentially harmful bacteria and viruses that can circulate through car air conditioning systems. This can be achieved with just 30-minute treatments of the passenger compartment using ozonized air while the ventilation system is running. It's an efficient and effective way to maintain a clean and healthy car interior environment.

WONDERTOOL™ is a versatile and effective tool, but it's essential to handle ozone with caution, as it can be dangerous when mishandled. Ozone is a potent oxidizer that is generally safe for humans and mammals at low concentrations but highly effective against microorganisms like bacteria. It's crucial to respect ozone's oxidative capabilities and use it appropriately.

We have meticulously tested and selected the ozone generator's power to ensure that it fully dissolves in water during the process. However, some ozone may still be released into the environment. Therefore, it's important to use WONDERTOOL™ in well-ventilated spaces and avoid prolonged exposure to the room while it is in operation. Ozone will rapidly convert back to harmless oxygen once its job is done.

Ozone is widely used in various applications, including swimming pools, hospitals, and hotels, for water disinfection and air purification. It is also effective in cleaning industrial and domestic laundries, reducing pollution, and minimizing the use of chemical detergents. Ozone has received approval from reputable agencies such as the FDA, USDA, and the EPA for its antimicrobial disinfectant properties.
